title: Drone with Camera, 1080P HD FPV Foldable Drone for Kids Adults Beginners, Brushless Motor RC Quadcopter with Stable Hover, Gestures Selfie, Waypoint Fly, 3D Flips, One Key Start, 2 Batteries
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 1080P Adjustable FPV Drone: Equipped with 1080P HD camera and 90° remote controller adjustable lens, this drone can bring you a stunning aerial photography experience from different perspectives to broaden your views. By connecting the drone with ”DAZLEN FPV” APP, it allows you to view the fabulous scenery in live through the FPV technolog, immerse yourself in the excitement of the distant aerial exploration and share the extraordinary moments with friends on social media.

Multiple Functions for Freely Fly: This drone with camera features one-button takeoff/landing, optical flow positioning, headless mode, 3 speeds, gravity control, Low battery warning and emergency stop. Additionally, with the intelligent features like lightning-fast 360° flips, gesture control photograph/video, trajectory flight and music, it can add an extra dimension of excitement and entertainment to your flying adventure experience no matter you are a beginner or skilled player.

Beginner Friendly with Flexible Control: The camera drone provides effortless handling and flexible control for kids and beginners, allowing users of all skilled levels to master the flying skills easily and fly with confidence. One key start and emergency stop function can effectively eliminate the fear of first flight. The advanced altitude maintenance systems ensure a stable flight. And 3 speed modes make it possible for novices and advanced pilot to find their own way to explore the sky.

Long Flight Time & Full Accessories: Features with low power alarm, brushless motor, 4 propeller guards and spare fan blades to ensure a safe flight of the drone. The 2 rechargeable batteries can support a long flight time up to 26 mins and the dedicated storage case make it more convenient to take the rc drone outdoors, allowing you to experience the thrill of outdoor flight whether you are traveling, camping or hiking!

Trusted Flying Companion: For your first test flight, we recommend you to fly the drone with a propeller guard indoor or in an open space without wind. Elevating your using experience and maximize the drone's potential by watching video tutorials and instructions. This mini drone is an excellent toy for kids, friends and family. Any problems about the quadcopter, pls do not hesitate to contact us for 24-hour technical support and immediate problem-solving.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the drone a great value for money. They find it easy to use and set up, with an intuitive app and simple controls. The drone is sturdy and stable both indoors and out, with crash guards to prevent propeller damage. The battery life is decent for short flights, and having two extra batteries means double the flight time. The hover feature is also appreciated.

title: Brushless Motor Drone,90° Adjustable 4K FPV,APP control,40min Flight Time,Indoor Obstacle Avoidance,Optical Flow Positioning,Gesture Photography,360° Flip,Eyond-Range Loss Alert, Toys Gifts for Men Boys
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【4K Ultra HD Quality & Real-time Transmission, 90-degree Adjustable Shock-absorbing Camera, 4000 Feet Control Distance】Our drone offers 4k resolution for photo taking and video recording, and you have the flexibility to adjust the angle 90 degrees up and down using the remote control. With 50 times software amplification accessible via the app and a robust shock-absorbing design, the drone is built to capture stable video footage and images. The control distance can reach up to 4000 feet.

【40-minute Endurance Battery, Accessible Accessories】Our drone is furnished with two reliable batteries, enabling a maximum flight duration of 40 minutes. Should you require more batteries and drone blades, they can be acquired through contacting our customer service or via Amazon. We are committed to providing full accessory services to support your drone's consistent operation.

【Brushless Motor, Precise Optical Flow Positioning, Dependable Air Pressure Altitude Hold】Our drone is equipped with a substantial brushless motor, which ensures commendable wind resistance and flight stability. Its advanced optical flow positioning technology helps maintain steady flight even when at a height of 15 meters. Along with the drone's headless mode, the likelihood of misplacing the drone is considerably minimized.

【Comprehensive Instructional Videos, Responsive After-sales Service, Learner-friendly】We offer a variety of in-depth video tutorials that guide you through different drone operation techniques, prepping you for handling more advanced drones. Our customer service team is available round the clock, willing to assist with your inquiries at any time. We aspire to make the enjoyment of drone flying accessible to all.

【Intelligent Gesture Photography, 360-degree Roll, Diverse Flight Modes】Our app includes a plethora of drone operation functionalities such as gesture-recognition photography, 360-degree roll, and more. The app has built-in mv production and a variety of filters and music .You can easily achieve your desired video and readily share it on social media. The drone also accommodates VR screen mode, three-speed adjustment, and indoor obstacle avoidance mode

title: Holy Stone Mini Drone for Kids and Beginners, Indoor Outdoor Quadcopter Plane for Boys Girls with Auto Hover, 3D Flips, 3 Batteries, Headless Mode, Great Gift Toy for Boys and Girls, Green
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Fun Tricks: This mini & portable buddy can do Toss to Launch, 3D flips, Auto Rotation and Circle Fly; boys & girls love these functions! Speed adjustable. Suitable for indoor or outdoor flight. Small body, big fun!
Auto-hovering: Altitude hold enables the quadcopter to hover at current height. Start or land with one key which makes this pocket toy easier to play. Super stability under your control.

3 Batteries Extend Flight Time -- Flight time is up to 21 Minutes. Never be disappointed by a dead battery or waiting for charging! And the low battery power alarm spares any concerns of any loss or damage due to low power.
Headless Mode: Have fun with the nano drone without worrying about what direction it is facing, especially when it is out of your sight.
Low Battery Alarm: No worry losing it. The full protection guard protects toddlers hurting. Fairly safe to play it with your family or friends. Great gifts for children, teens, plane fans.

Note: When using multiple drones at the same time, please be sure to power on and pair each drone and remote control separately to avoid frequency confusion caused by powering on multiple units simultaneously.

A new mode to start the drone flight! Enjoy more fun! 
High Speed Rotation 
High-Speed rotation brings a thrilling exprience

Altitude Hold enables the drone to hover at current height even when your hands off the controller

Do tricks with 3D flips. Kids love this function! 
One-Key Start/Landing 
Pressing the button to take off or land makes it easy to control, especially for beginners. 
Next page
1 Throw to GO 2 High Speed Rotation 3 Altitude Hold 4 3D Flips 5 One-Key Start/Landing 
Discover More Joy with HS210 Drone! 
Full Protection 

Full protection guards designed for children's safe, ensure that there will be no accident during the game. Keep safe from danger and crash. 
3 Speeds Switch 

Comes with Low/Medium/High different modes. Short press the button with the speed sign to switch speed modes. 
21 Mins Flight Time 

Equipped with three batteries, each providing over 7 minutes of flight time, indulge in a 21-minute aerial adventure. 
What's In the Box? 

Drone*1, Transmitter*1, Drone Battery*3, USB Charging Port*1, Propeller*4, Screwdriver*1, Propeller Spanner*1, Instructions For Use*1 
Kid-Friendly Remote Controller 
Tech Specs 
Max Flight Time 	7 minutes per battery 	
Weight 	50 Grams 	
Dimension 	3.15*3.15*1.18 in 	
Charging Time 	40-60 minutes 	
Transmission Distance 	164ft/50m 	
Package Include 	Drone*1, Transmitter*1, Drone Battery*3, USB Charger*1, Propeller*4, Screwdriver*1, Propeller Spanner*1, Instructions For Use*1 	
What is the flight time per battery? 
About 7 minutes per battery. HS210 got 3 batteries, a total of 21 minutes. 
What's the difference between HS210 and HS210T? 
HS210T features two battery while HS210 has three. Besides, HS210T combines land and sky mode/four posture deformations. 
Will my 12 years old boy be able to fly this drone easily? 
HS210 is designed to be easy to fly for pilots of all ages, including kids aged 8 to 12. Its simple and intuitive remote control, stable flight performance make it a great choice for beginners who are just starting out with drone flying. 
How can I know when the battery is running low? Will it suddenly fall from a high place? 
When the drone battery runs low, the indicator lights on the drone will blink continuously. About 1 minute or so the drone will automatically land on low electricity.

title: Potensic ATOM LT GPS Drone Under 249g, 40 Mins Long Flight, EIS 2.5K Camera, 4KM FPV Transmission, Brushless Motor, Precise Auto Return, SurgeFly, Entry Level Foldable Drone for Adults Beginner, White
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【<𝟐𝟒𝟗𝐠 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝐅𝐀𝐀/𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐃 𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞】As a take-off weight of 𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟒𝟗𝐠 𝐝𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐞, Potensic ATOM LT eliminates the need for FAA or Remote ID registration. Portable 𝐟𝐨𝐥𝐝-𝐮𝐩 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 allows for convenient storage and fits in any pocket. (Folded Size: 3.5x5.6x2.3inches) ! 𝗔𝗧𝗢𝗠 𝗟𝗧 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗼𝗻𝗹𝘆 𝗳𝗹𝘆 𝗶𝗻 𝗚𝗣𝗦 𝗺𝗼𝗱𝗲, 𝗽𝗹𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗼𝘂𝘁𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗮

【𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚-𝐥𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝟒𝟎 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐬 𝐌𝐚𝐱 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞】Featuring a long-last 3000mAh intelligent battery, this drone enables an impressive 𝟒𝟎 𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞 on a single charge, ahead most of the other models. 𝐈𝐝𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐝𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐬 to practice cruising for longer distances

【𝟐.𝟓𝐊 𝐄𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫】ATOM LT supports 𝟐𝟓𝟔𝟎𝐱𝟏𝟒𝟒𝟎 aerial photos and 𝟐.𝟓𝐊@𝟑𝟎𝐟𝐩𝐬 HD videos. The ShakeVanish 2.0 stabilization provides superior camera stability and ensures clear, smooth footage. The camera is 𝟏𝟏𝟖° 𝐅𝐎𝐕 and vertical +𝟐𝟎° 𝐭𝐨 -𝟗𝟎° 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞, enables dynamic FPV experience

【𝟒𝐊𝐌 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐏𝐢𝐱𝐒𝐲𝐧𝐜 𝟐.𝟎】The PixSync 2.0 transmission system and dedicated remote controller maintain a smooth HD video feed at a distance of up to 𝟒 𝐊𝐌/𝟏𝟑𝟏𝟐𝟑𝐟𝐭. Experience minimal latency as you capture distant scenic beauty with precision

【𝐌𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐮𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐅𝐥𝐲 𝟐.𝟎, Perfect Entry-Level Choice】Built-in 𝐛𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫 ensures stability in 𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝟓 𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐝 condition. A simple and flexible control system is tailored for drone beginners. Explore 3 flight modes for an easy and engaging flying experience

【𝟒 𝐆𝐍𝐒𝐒 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐬, High-Precise GPS Functions】Our GPS drone supports 4 satellite positioning systems:𝐆𝐏𝐒, 𝐆𝐋𝐎𝐍𝐀𝐒𝐒, 𝐆𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐥𝐞𝐨 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐁𝐞𝐢𝐃𝐨𝐮, provide high-accuracy GPS positioning for Auto Return Home and enjoy fun features like Follow Me, Waypoint Fly, and Circle Fly
【Always Improving】 All firmware supports FOTA, we recommend keeping up to date with the latest firmware to enjoy the ever-improving flight experience and shooting quality

【Kindly Reminder】ATOM LT App is compatible with iOS 11 and Android 7.0 or above, and we offer 2 types of adapter cables (Type C/Lightning) to connect your phone and the remote control, you can choose the one you need

description: Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. Weighing less than 249 grams, no test is required in most countries regions.* It's also stunningly easy to use, with a 31-min max flight time, a 10km (32,800 feet) max transmission range, incredible 4K footage, and so much more.Notes:1. Standard aircraft weight (including the Intelligent Flight Battery, propellers, and a microSD card). The actual product weight may vary due to differences in batch materials and external factors. Training or examination is not required for flying this product in most countries and regions. Always check local laws and regulations before use.2. FCC compliant and tested in an open outdoor environment without interference.3. Flight time is measured in a controlled test environment. Specific test conditions are as follows: flying forward at a constant speed of 17 kph in a windless laboratory environment, in photo mode (without photo-taking operation during flight), and from 100% battery level until 0%. Under the preceding conditions, a maximum range of 62 minutes can be achieved by replacing the battery once, or 93 minutes by replacing the battery twice.* DJI Mini 4K must be activated in the DJI Fly App, please go to the official website to download the DJI Fly App before use. ** Please check and strictly abide by local laws and regulations before flying.*** Tested with a production model DJI Mini 4K in a controlled environment. Actual experience may vary depending on the environment, usage, and firmware version.**** All videos and photos on this page were taken in strict compliance with local laws and regulations.
features: No Registration Needed - Under 249 g, FAA Registration and Remote ID are not required if you fly for recreational purposes. Visit the FAA's official website for requirements related to drone registration and Remote ID. [1]

4K Ultra HD & 3-Axis Gimbal for Cinematic Quality Shooting - Capture stunning moments in any light—sunrises, sunsets, and night scenes with crystal-clear 4K resolution. Thanks to the 3-axis gimbal, you can achieve cinematic-quality footage.
38kph (Level 5) Wind Resistant - DJI Mini 4K has a stable flight even in Level 5 winds. Brushless motors enhance power and allow takeoff at altitudes up to 4,000 meters.

10km Max HD Video Transmission-up to 10 km (32,800 feet) [2] of HD video transmission and has excellent anti-interference capabilities, giving you the ability to freely explore vast landscapes and see clearer.

Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. To ensure a better product usage experience, please log in to the DJI official website to download the latest version of DJI Fly.

Uninterrupted Creation with Extended Battery Life - There are three sets available for you to choose from: 1-battery set (31-min), 2-battery set (62-min), or 3-battery set (93-min). [3] Say goodbye to battery anxiety and let nothing hold you back.

Beginner-Friendly and Safe - DJI Mini 4K supports one-tap takeoff/landing, GPS Return to Home (RTH) and stable hovering, and one-touch easy operation for novices. Additional in-app learning resources help you master flight quickly.

Boost Your Inspiration with Intelligent QuickShots - With just a few taps, DJI Mini 4K automatically shoots professional-level videos using Helix, Dronie, Rocket, Circle, and Boomerang QuickShots. Getting your dream shot is easier than you think.

Includes DJI Mini 4K, 3 batteries, a two-way charging hub, shoulder bag, and everything else you need for extended flight. Two extra batteries let you capture more of your favorite moments like time with family and friends.

Get Cinematic Shots With a Single Tap 
Dronie 

DJI Mini 4K's camera centers on the subject as the aircraft travels backward at an incline. Dronie creates a natural panning-out effect to capture the subject and the scenery around it effortlessly. The shot helps develop a sense of scale and grandeur in any location. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Helix 

DJI Mini 4K ascends while flying in a spiral that expands gradually with the camera centered on the subject. The pilot can select a clockwise or counter-clockwise helix. The shot captured with Helix allows the pilot to create a shot that blends the subject's interaction with the environment instead of solely focusing on the subject alone. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Rocket 

DJI Mini 4K's camera focuses downward on the subject as the aircraft ascends rapidly. Whether your subject is in a crowded or empty space, this can give your video a sense of density as the camera keeps the subject centered and pans out directly overhead, enclosing it in its surroundings. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Circle 

DJI Mini 4K's camera centers on the subject and circles around it once at a constant altitude. The pilot can select a clockwise or counter-clockwise rotation. Circle creates a shot that captures the subject from every angle in the environment, enhancing the subject's presence in its surroundings. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Boomerang 

DJI Mini 4K flies around the subject in an oval path, ascending as it flies away and descending as it returns. The pilot selects a subject, and the camera captures a quick shot highlighting the importance of the subject in the location in a dynamic way that increases the focus on the subject.

modules.title: Get Cinematic Shots With a Single Tap

items.title: Dronie
items.text: DJI Mini 4K's camera centers on the subject as the aircraft travels backward at an incline. Dronie creates a natural panning-out effect to capture the subject and the scenery around it effortlessly. The shot helps develop a sense of scale and grandeur in any location.

items.title: Helix
items.text: DJI Mini 4K ascends while flying in a spiral that expands gradually with the camera centered on the subject. The pilot can select a clockwise or counter-clockwise helix. The shot captured with Helix allows the pilot to create a shot that blends the subject's interaction with the environment instead of solely focusing on the subject alone.

items.title: Rocket
items.text: DJI Mini 4K's camera focuses downward on the subject as the aircraft ascends rapidly. Whether your subject is in a crowded or empty space, this can give your video a sense of density as the camera keeps the subject centered and pans out directly overhead, enclosing it in its surroundings.

items.title: Circle
items.text: DJI Mini 4K's camera centers on the subject and circles around it once at a constant altitude. The pilot can select a clockwise or counter-clockwise rotation. Circle creates a shot that captures the subject from every angle in the environment, enhancing the subject's presence in its surroundings.

items.title: Boomerang
items.text: DJI Mini 4K flies around the subject in an oval path, ascending as it flies away and descending as it returns. The pilot selects a subject, and the camera captures a quick shot highlighting the importance of the subject in the location in a dynamic way that increases the focus on the subject.

items.title: Panorama
items.text: Select from Sphere, Wide Angle, and 180° panoramas, and Mini 4K will do the rest, generating a panoramic masterpiece effortlessly with one tap. The different Panorama effects allow you to capture classic panoramic and other panoramic images with a wide-angle or spherical effect without having to do any photo editing in post.

title: Bwine F7GB2 Drone with 4K Camera for Adults, 3-Axis Gimbal, 9800FT Transmission Range, FAA compliance, 50Mins Flight Time with 2 Batteries, GPS Auto Return+Follow Me+Beginner Mode
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【FAA Compliance】: This drone with camera complies with the FAA Declaration of Compliance and has a built-in remote ID module, there is no need for an extra remote ID module. You can find the remote ID on the Bwine F7GB2 drone arm including the QR code, if you still can't find your drone's RID, please feel free to contact us through the contact information on the manual or our App for assistance. In an emergency, our newly released B112 Remote ID can also help you track and locate your drone. If you need it, please search B0D7ZXX5KL directly on Amazon.

【Native 4K UHD Camera 】:This Pro drones with camera for adults 4k comes with 4K(3840x2160) resolution. standard HD (1920x1080) has only 2.07 million pixels, while our 4K UHD drone has 8.7 million pixels and is equipped with a 90° /120° FOV adjustable wide-angle lens, offering higher density for displaying more details and clearer images, including more realistic colors and adaptation to larger screens.

【Advanced 3-Axis Gimbal】This GPS bwine drone is equiped with The three axis(pitch, roll and yaw) , they are mutually perpendicular and can rotate freely. Through gyroscopes and sensors, they detect the orientation and adjust it in real-time to counteract vibrations or interference, ensuring stable imaging of the camera. Besides, 5x digital zoom also helps to switch between shots of varying distance, direction, and composition, making your aerial photography more diverse

【Level 6 Wind Resistance】: Flying our Bwine F7 drone, you will experience a quieter and more steady flight due to the low-noise brushless motors and level 6 wind resistance. Filming is easy and entertaining while you watch on your phone because this drone can hover in a place without worrying about moving

【50 Mins Flight Time】: The Bwine drones with camera for adults 4k comes with 2 intelligent batteries, each providing 25 minutes of flight time for a total of 50 minutes. To ensure optimal performance, please use a 5V/3A or 5V/2A wall charger to charge the batteries. It takes about 6.5 hours to fully charge the battery
【9800ft Long Range Transmission】: The Bwine F7GB2 drones for adults long range, has extended video transmission range up to 9800ft, providing you crisp images and smooth video

【GPS, No Lost Drones】: The Bwine f7 gps drones with camera for adults 4k is equipped with intelligent GPS-assisted features, including GPS Auto Return, Follow Me, and Waypoints. With GPS Auto Return, the drone will automatically return home when the signal is lost or the battery is low. You can also press the Return to Home button to bring the drone back to you. Losing your drone won't be a problem

【Quick Resolution of Customer Issues】: The Bwine Team keeps standing our F7 drones. You don't have to worry about your problem not being fixed as we are always responsible with our product, very quick to answer to an issue, and very eager to keep a customer pleased

【Share Your Joy with One Click】: The Bwine drones with camera can get the first view of the beauty and share it to YouTube, Twitter, Facebook and other social platforms through the APP to share your happiness with more friends

【Package Includes】: 1 x Bwine F7GB2 Drone, 2 x 2600mAh Batteries (11.1V), 4 x Extra Propeller Blades, 1 x Transmitter, 1 x Carrying Shell Case, 2 x USB Cable, 1 x Allen wrench, 6 x Screw, 2 x User Manual

title: DJI Neo Three-Battery Combo, Mini Drone with 4K UHD Camera for Adults, 135g Self Flying Drone that Follows You, Palm Takeoff, AI Subject Tracking, QuickShots, Stabilized Video (Controller-Free)
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
description: * Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. DJI Neo must be activated in the DJI Fly App, to ensure a better product usage experience, please go to the DJI official website to download the App before use.Soar through breathtaking outdoor landscapes and explore stunning indoor scenes, ensuring everyone is included in the group photo. Discover a fresh perspective on everyday life with DJI Neo.DJI Neo comes in three purchasing options:The DJI Neo standard combo includes DJI Neo, a Battery, Propeller Guard (Pair), and more.The DJI Neo Two-Battery Combo adds more flexibility to your flight time. It Includes DJI Neo, 2 Batteries, Propeller Guard (Pair), and more.The DJI Three-Battery Combo provides extended flight time with DJI Neo, 3 Batteries, Two-Way Charging Hub, Propeller Guard (Pair), and more.
features: Lightweight and Regulation Friendly - At just 135g, DJI Neo may be even lighter than your phone and does not require FAA registration and Remote ID. Throw Neo in your backpack or even your pocket. Just grab and go!

Palm Takeoff & Landing, Go Controller-Free [1] - Neo takes off from your hand with just a push of a button. Neo's safe and easy operation makes it perfect for taking to family BBQs and hiking with friends.
AI Subject Tracking & QuickShots - Effortlessly capture stunning vlogs as DJI Neo smartly follows you. Getting professional footage has never been easier with eight creative QuickShots modes!

Multiple Control Options, Flexible Fun - Fly Neo controller-free or with voice control (EN/CN), mobile app, or RC. Capture an epic birthday or film a family picnic; these versatile options make it easy for everyone to try!

4K Ultra-Stabilized Video [8] - Whether you're hiking, kayaking, or just strolling in a windy park, DJI stabilization technology, level-4 wind resistance, and 4K UHD combine to ensure smooth, high-quality footage.
Full-Coverage Propeller Guards - Nervous flyers, let go of your worries! Dip and dive dynamically around your house and through tree branches without worry.*
Extend your flights to 54 minutes [14]. The DJI Neo Three-Battery Combo includes not only DJI Neo and 3 Batteries but also a Two-Way Charging Hub, so you can always have charged power at the ready.

* Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. DJI Neo must be activated in the DJI Fly App, to ensure a better product usage experience, please go to the DJI official website to download the App before use.

features: 【𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝟐𝟒𝟗𝐠】 The palm-sized drone, ATOM, 𝐝𝐨𝐞𝐬𝐧'𝐭 𝐫𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞 𝐅𝐀𝐀 𝐨𝐫 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐃 𝐫𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧. The compact design and 𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐛𝐚𝐠 make it easy to carry along on adventures

title: Drone with Camera, Mini Drone for Kids with 1080P HD FPV Camera, Brushless Motor, One Key Take Off/Land, Optical Flow Positioning, 360°Flip, Waypoint Fly, Gestures Selfie, 3 Speeds, 2 Batteries, Toys for Beginners
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: High speed and stability: The upgraded brushless motor has less noise, lower power consumption and longer service life. It can achieve higher speed flight compared to brushed models. The optical positioning camera at the bottom lets the drone hover accurately and lock the height, helping you take stable photos or videos. The cool lighting design adds more fun to the flight experience.

FPV real-time control: The drone with camera is equipped with a 1080P HD lens, which can be adjusted by 90°to provide a multi-angle landscape view to take better aerial photos and videos. Through WIFI transmission, you can watch real-time videos through the app, add filters and music, and then share every moment with your friends on social media.

Portable and fun: This kids drone weighs less than ½ a pound, and you don’t need to wait for FAA registration to enjoy the fun of flying immediately. The drone adopts a foldable design, compact size, and is equipped with a suitcase as well as two large-capacity rechargeable batteries. You can carry it with you and get a 30-minute uninterrupted long-term flight experience on the go. It is an ideal toy for fun with your family.

Suitable for beginners: Easy to learn features such as one key takeoff/landing, 3 speed adjustable, 360°flip, emergency stop, etc can help beginners master flight easily without worrying about losing control of the drone. In headless mode, the drone will fly in the direction of the joystick regardless of the direction the drone's head is facing.

APP control: Voice control allows the drone to be controlled using simple voice commands such as "forward" and "backward", and you can also experience gravity sensing mode. Draw a flight route on your phone, and the drone will fly according to the trajectory. Show a V gesture or palm in front of the camera, and the drone can automatically recognize and take photos or videos.

Helpful tips: To keep the drone stable, please make sure the ground is flat, the head of the drone is facing forward and calibrated horizontally before taking off. If need to use the app to control the drone flight, please disconnect the remote controller from the drone first.

Usage tips: 
1. Children under 14 years old should have parental guidance. 
2. Before taking off, please place it on a flat ground and perform horizontal calibration. 
3. When flying without headless mode, you need to confirm that the drone's head is facing forward. 
4. You need to fly at the highest speed in windy weather. 
5. The remote control distance is within 328 feet, please be careful not to exceed this range. 
6. The wind blades are divided into two types, A and B. Please install them correctly according to the letter, otherwise the wind blades will not rotate. 
7. When the drone's battery is low, the light will flash or the remote control will sound, please return as soon as possible. 
8. The user permission of the app needs to be allowed, otherwise the app cannot be used normally. 
9. If you need to use the app to control the flight, you need to disconnect the drone from the remote controller first.

modules.text:
Usage tips: 
1. Children under 14 years old should have parental guidance. 
2. Before taking off, please place it on a flat ground and perform horizontal calibration. 
3. When flying without headless mode, you need to confirm that the drone's head is facing forward. 
4. You need to fly at the highest speed in windy weather. 
5. The remote control distance is within 328 feet, please be careful not to exceed this range. 
6. The wind blades are divided into two types, A and B. Please install them correctly according to the letter, otherwise the wind blades will not rotate. 
7. When the drone's battery is low, the light will flash or the remote control will sound, please return as soon as possible. 
8. The user permission of the app needs to be allowed, otherwise the app cannot be used normally. 
9. If you need to use the app to control the flight, you need to disconnect the drone from the remote controller first.

The build quality is well-received, with customers describing it as solid and premium. The drone comes with two batteries for 30 minutes of flight time. The camera quality is good, taking clear video and photos.

title: X300C Mini Drone with Camera 720P HD FPV, RC Quadcopter Foldable Drone, Drone With Altitude Hold, 3D Flip, Headless Mode, Gravity Control and 2 Batteries, Gifts for Kids, Adults, Beginner
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【Optical Flow Positioning】The altitude hold function can keep the drone hovering at a fixed height to help you get wonderful videos and photos. In addition, the X300C drone also uses optical flow positioning technology, Hovering accurately in any position by the Optical Positioning camera, Friendly to beginners, which is very suitable for beginner players.

【WIFI FPV Camera】 SIMREX X300C drone is equipped with a 720P HD camera to help you capture the wonderful moments in life. You can easily connect the drone to "SIMREX Zoomy" mobile app via Wi-Fi and enjoy an immersive control experience through FPV transmission.

【Perfect for Adults and Kids】X300C mini drone offers a range of convenient and intelligent features, such as one key takeoff/landing, altitude hold, and headless mode function(the drone will fly in the direction of the remote control operation without observing the position of the drone's head), making it incredibly easy to control. It is perfect for beginner, kids, adults.

【Fun Gameplay and Stunts】The drone with camera offers a plethora of exciting gameplay options. You can effortlessly perform 360° flips (forward, backward, left, and right directions) or even draw a flight path on the app for the drone to follow. Additionally, it supports gravity sensing control, adding another layer of enjoyment to your flying experience.

【Safe Design】The SIMREX brand prioritizes customer safety above all else. Our drones are equipped with four propeller protective covers, protect the drone from collisions and the safety of personnel. With features like the emergency stop function and low battery alarm, you can enjoy a worry-free flight experience. Additionally, the drone comes with 2 modular batteries, providing up to 18 minutes of flight time for extended gaming enjoyment.

title: Holyton Drones with Camera for Adults 4k, HT50 Drone with Remote Control Camera, GPS Quadcopter Auto Return, Follow Me, Brushless Motor, Circle Fly, Waypoint Fly, Altitude Hold, Headless Mode

features: 【4K UHD Bird's-Eye View】The 4K drone features a 100° adjustable remote control 4K camera with a 120° wide-angle lens, enabling you to capture stunning wide-angle shots from a height of 1,640 feet for a breathtaking bird's-eye view. The high-resolution 4K camera drone captures an abundance of UHD 4K (4096x3072P) details, ensuring you can capture the perfect shot

【GPS Automatic Flight】Say goodbye to concerns about losing your drone. The auto return function ensures that the drone can fly back to you whenever the battery is low, the drone signal is lost, or you press the return key. This 4K drone is also equipped with multiple sensors, including air optical flow and air pressure altitude control systems, enabling stable hovering both indoors and outdoors, making it user-friendly even for young drone beginners

【Suitable for Various Flying Scenarios】With the GPS function, this drone can automatically trace and follow you, fly along a predetermined path, or orbit around a specific point. It also has the ability to capture photos or videos when you pose in front of the camera, allowing you to enjoy a wonderful flight experience in various shooting situations

【Easy & Convenient to Fly 】Weighing under 250g, this GPS drone does not require FAA registration. Its advanced foldable fuselage design allows you to easily carry it like a hamburger in your hand, enabling convenient and unrestricted flying anytime, anywhere

【Worry-Free Shopping】Enjoy a worry-free shopping experience as the manufacturer offers 24/7 full-time after-sales service and a 1-year replacement for free. With over 1,500,000 units sold annually in the global market, this drone with camera has received high praise for its user-friendly features and customer-oriented service. If you are not satisfied with the drone, you can contact the manufacturer via Amazon to find a solution

【GPS Searching】Place the drone on a flat and dry surface where is unobstructed and lit area. When the drone indicator lights turn solid green, the transmitter will send out a long beep, it means that the search for GPS signal is completed. This process may take about one minute

features: Easy to Fly - Our drone is designed to be as user-friendly as possible, featuring altitude hold, headless mode, and one key take-off / landing. This ensures beginners can fully enjoy flight without pressure, making it an ideal choice for kids and adults alike.

1080P HD Drone with Camera - Equipped with a 1080P HD camera that can be allows you to capture stunning aerial scenery from a wide-angle lens. Whether it's a deserted beach or a fun family reunion, our drone with camera will help you catch every wonderful moment.

FPV Real-time Transmission - Experience real-time video transmission directly to your mobile device. The FPV (First Person View) feature ensures you get a live feed of what your drone sees, enhancing the fun and excitement of flying.

3 Speed Modes & 3D Flip - The drone offers three adjustable speed levels (Low / Medium / High), providing an exciting flight experience for both beginners and experienced pilots. Additionally, it can perform awesome 3D flips, giving you unexpected fun.

Safe and Durable Design - With a fully covered outer casing for all four propellers, the drone helps prevent injuries and is durable enough to withstand minor collisions. The motor stops working upon impact to prevent excessive wear, making this small drone a reliable companion.

Gravity Control - Control your drone by tilting your mobile device, providing an intuitive and interactive flying experience. This unique feature makes it a fun drones for kids 8-12 age and a perfect kids camera for capturing memorable moments.
Gesture Photo - Easily take photos and videos with simple hand gestures. This feature makes capturing pictures easy and fun, perfect for kids who love to take selfies with their drone.
Long Flight Time - The drone comes with two batteries, providing extended flight time for every practice session. This ensures you can enjoy flying for longer periods without frequent recharging.

Compact and Portable - Thanks to its foldable design, this mini drone is easy to carry anywhere. Whether for indoor or outdoor use, it’s perfect for adventures on the go, making it an excellent choice for both kids and adults.

Perfect Gift - This drone is an ideal Birthday/Christmas gift for kids or friends. Its educational and entertaining features make it a fantastic drone for kids 8-12, helping to develop reaction skills and improve hand-eye coordination through play.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Gravity Control 
With a built-in G-sensor, With the built-in gravity sensor, you can control the camera drone's front, back, left, and right movements by tilting the smartphone paired with the drone. Enjoy intuitive controls! 
Headless Mode 
In headless mode, the drone will fly in the direction the right stick is pointing. Based on geographic orientation, so you can fly the drone without worrying about which direction it's facing, especially if it's further away. 
1080P 3D Visual Enjoyment 
3D viewing mode, use VR glasses (not included) to directly enjoy real-time 1080P HD live video. You can get amazing visual fidelity and a great first person 3D view. Happy flying with family. 
Yeah gesture photography 
About 2m in front of the drone camera, place one hand flat and make a "yes" gesture. After the drone recognizes it successfully, it will start a 3-second countdown and take a picture automatically. To provide recognition, aim the lens as directly as possible and fly in a well-lit environment as much as possible. 
Palm gesture video 
About 2m in front of the aircraft camera, put your five fingers together and one hand flat. After the aircraft is recognized successfully, a 3-second countdown starts, and the video recording starts automatically. Recognize the same gesture again until the end of the recording (Time interval: the interval between two recognition should be greater than 3 seconds) 
Smart Voice Control 
Turn on the "Control Switch" and click the "Voice Control" button. 
Say "Fly, Land, Forward, Backward, Left, Right, Photo", the toy drone will reflect correspondent actions. 
Note: Use in noisy environments will result in low recognition rates.

breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 1080P HD Camera Adjustable FPV Drone & APP Control-- Equipped with an adjustable-angle 1080P HD camera, this drone is capable of capturing stunning aerial photos and videos, recording your life's moments. Use the "X61 DRONE" app to connect and control the drone, and watch real-time video feed through FPV technology, allowing you to explore distant landscapes or capture unforgettable moments from the sky, then share them with your friends on social media.Photo/video with gestures automatically.

Foldable Drone, Full Accessories, Thoughtful design-- The package includes a portable bag for convenient outdoor travel. Equipped with two 1000mAh batteries, enjoy an extended flight time for up to 22 minutes of fun. It comes propeller guards, and spare fan blades, allowing you to fly right out of the box with safety assurance. The powerful motors ensure safe & reliable operation,with built-in overcurrent protection. Foldable body make the drone small and portable.

One Key Take-off & Optical Flow Positioning-- The one-key takeoff and altitude hold functions make drone flight easily. The hovering system and optical flow positioning technology ensure a more stable and controllable flight, keeping the drone at a certain height and capturing high-quality photos and videos. The one-key 3D flip adds more fun. This drone can fly along a pre-set path or orbit around a point. When you strike a pose in front of the camera, it will take photos or record videos.

Multiple Functions for Kids Beginners--Features: optical flow positioning, barometric altitude hold, 3D flips, headless mode, three-speed modes, one-key takeoff/landing/return/emergency stop, 360° flips, trajectory flight, gesture photo/video and low battery warning make it extremely beginner-friendly and suitable for kids. The operation is easy and fun. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, drone will provide you with a delightful flying adventure experience.

Professional Flight Partner After Sales Guarantee-- We recommend installing the propeller guards for the first flight in an open area. For product-related issues, we provide 24-hour technical support and refund services to all customers. A mini drone with a camera makes for a cool and creative toy for your friends, partner, son, or grandson. The functionality of this drone will help them enjoy an ever-improving flying experience and capture high-quality shots.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Previous page
Next page
1 User Friendly 2 Thoughtful Design 3 Package Contents 4 Exclusive Support 
Palm Gesture Video 
Showing five fingers and a flat hand. When recognized, it starts a 3s countdown for video recording. Repeat the gesture for continuous recording. 
Yeah Gesture to Take a Photo 
Gesture "Y" 2M from the drone. When recognized, it starts a 3s countdown for a photo. Aim at the lens, and fly well-lit. 
Smart Voice Control 
Say "Fly, Land, Forward, Backward, Left, Right, Photo" for the toy drone to respond accordingly. Caution: Recognition may be lower in noisy settings. 
VR Mode 
Try the 3D viewing mode with VR glasses (not included) for live 1080P HD video. Enjoy a stunning first-person 3D view. Happy flying with family! 
Headless Mode 
It reacts to commands according to where you are or how you tilt the controller, no matter which way the drone is facing. 
3 Speed Modes 
With 3 speed modes (low/medium/high), it lets you start at a comfortable pace, making it super beginner-friendly. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use. 
Trajectory Flight 
Draw a path on the app for the drone to follow in large open areas. Great feature for first-timers (try a straight line or small arc first). 
360 Flips 
Just press the 360-degree button on the remote control and the drone will do a 360-degree flip. What a fantastic flying experience!

features: ✈【1080P HD Camera & Live Video】-- Upgrade 1080P HD wide-angle camera with 120° adjustable angle, capture the video and photos and share instantly on social media through APP control - Equipped with built-in camera and advanced FPV transmission tech, the drone can deliver 1080P image/video, you can see beautiful scenery from different perspectives in real-time, leaving you with immersive experience!

✈【Two Baeetries for Long Time Fly】-- You can enjoy up to 26 minutes of flight time in total with Two batteries (3.7V, 1800mAh）. Upgraded charging cable uses imported chips for overvoltage protection to prevent accidents caused by incorrect charging. MOCVOO RC quadcopter also comes with four protective propeller guards, to avoid propeller damage during flight and extend the drone life. When in low battery, the lights of the drone continue to flash, you can operate it return to aviod loss.

✈【Multifunctional & More Fun to Fly】-- Give wings to your imagination - MOCVOO camera drone features in 3 adjustable speed levels (from low to high, beginners to experts), One Key Take Off/Landing (beginner-friendly), 360°Flip (fun trick in the sky) .You can define an exact flying route on the App map, the drone will fly following the path, brings you wonderful flying experiences. Show “V” or “palm” gesture to let the camera drone recognize and take pictures or video.

✈【Foldable Design & Carrying Case】-- Our mini drone is a foldable design make this quadcopter drone small, you can take it anywhere you like. And comes with a handy carry case can easy to take out to have fun with your family when going outside. It is the ideal product for birthday, Christmas, Fathers Day or other Day. The considerate design with carrying case that will be loved by kids Men Teenagers Boys husband and boyfriend.

✈【Good Service】-- We suggest you test flight in an open space first time flying the drone. (Note: there might be wind interference when using outdoors. In the windy outdoors, it is recommended to adjust the flight speed to the third high speed to avoid the wind interference and loss of control.) If the drone/remote control/APP has any issue during flight, please email seller and we'll provide 24hrs technical support, 18-month quality and 30-day money back for any reason.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
MOCVOO Drone With Camera For Adults, Beginners, Kids/ 1080P FPV Camera 
-- Can be controlled by remote and APP, our small drone is ultra-portable as your hiking/fishing/travelling companion, capturing your precious moments! 
-- If the drone/remote control/APP has any problems during flight, do not hesitate to email seller and we'll provide 24hrs support, 18-month quality repair. 
Warm Tips： 
● It is recommended that beginners do not fly in strong winds. Flying high, please take care not to be blown away by the wind. 
● It is recommended to use the third gear flying speed in a windy environment, otherwise the drone may lose control because it cannot withstand the wind. 
● The remote control distance should not exceed 80 meters, otherwise it may cause the drone to lose control. 
● The drone will flash a red light when the battery is low, please return as soon as possible to avoid fall. 
● If you need to take photos or videos, it is recommended that the fly drone should not be too far away from the subject to ensure better shooting results. 
● When the remote control battery is low, it will not be able to connect, please pay attention to keep the remote control battery full. 
1080P HD Camera 
MOCVOO drone quipped with 1080p HD cameras, the camera can be adjusted 120°. 
FPV Transmission 
Real-time transmission can simultaneously record and show the beautiful scenery captured by the drone, allowing you to enjoy the visual feast anytime, anywhere. 
One Key Take Off/Landing 
Press the button to take off or land the drone, it is very convenient. Especially very friendly for beginners. 
50X Zoom & Gesture Control 
With gesture control, you can pose to the camera to trigger phone taking and video recording. Free your hands free to take wonderful shot. In addition, you can set the magnification effect of taking pictures from 1x to 50x zoom on the phone. You can capture more details you want to see. (Palm means taking photos; Fist means recording videos) 
3 Speed Adjustment 
This camera drone has three speed modes（ low/medium/ high）, suitable for beginners and intermediates and experts. You can have a different flight experience for fun. In the outdoors, it is recommended to adjust the flight speed to the high speed before taking off, so that it is powerful, which can avoid the problem of losing control of the drone due to the resistance of the outdoor wind. 
All-round Propeller Protection 
Our quadcopter comes with 4 protective propeller guards, Install the propeller guard before flying, especially for beginners. It can reduce the damage caused by collision to the propeller blade, protect the drone and peolpe. Make it more durable. 
Specification Of MOCVOO Drone 
Video/Photo Resolution 	HD 1920*1080P 	
Drone Battery 	2 X 3.7V 1800 mAh 	
Flight Time 	10-15mins/per battery (depends on the speed) 	
Battery of Controller 	3 X 1.5V AA Battery (Not included) 	
Control Distance 	90-100 meters (depends on phone device and environment） 	
FPV Transmission Range 	82 feet/ 25 m (depends on phone device and environment） 	
Battery Charge Time 	About 90 minutes

title: X300C Mini Drone with Camera 720P HD FPV, RC Quadcopter Foldable Drone, Drone With Altitude Hold, 3D Flip, Headless Mode, Gravity Control and 2 Batteries, Gifts for Kids, Adults, Beginner, Yellow
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【Optical Flow Positioning】The altitude hold function can keep the drone hovering at a fixed height to help you get wonderful videos and photos. In addition, the X300C drone also uses optical flow positioning technology, Hovering accurately in any position by the Optical Positioning camera, Friendly to beginners, which is very suitable for beginner players.

【WIFI FPV Camera】 SIMREX X300C drone is equipped with a 720P HD camera to help you capture the wonderful moments in life. You can easily connect the drone to "SIMREX Zoomy" mobile app via Wi-Fi and enjoy an immersive control experience through FPV transmission.

【Perfect for Adults and Kids】X300C mini drone offers a range of convenient and intelligent features, such as one key takeoff/landing, altitude hold, and headless mode function(the drone will fly in the direction of the remote control operation without observing the position of the drone's head), making it incredibly easy to control. It is perfect for beginner, kids, adults.

【Fun Gameplay and Stunts】The drone with camera offers a plethora of exciting gameplay options. You can effortlessly perform 360° flips (forward, backward, left, and right directions) or even draw a flight path on the app for the drone to follow. Additionally, it supports gravity sensing control, adding another layer of enjoyment to your flying experience.

【Safe Design】The SIMREX brand prioritizes customer safety above all else. Our drones are equipped with four propeller protective covers, protect the drone from collisions and the safety of personnel. With features like the emergency stop function and low battery alarm, you can enjoy a worry-free flight experience. Additionally, the drone comes with 2 modular batteries, providing up to 18 minutes of flight time for extended gaming enjoyment.
[Foldable Design, Easy to Carry] The Simrex drone is small, light, and foldable, and can be easily put into a pocket or backpack.

features: 【2K HD Camera & 5G Real-time Transmission 】The 2K drone is equipped with a 90° electrically adjustable camera, enabling effortless adjustment of the camera angle for enhanced perspectives. Built-in shock absorption and 5GHz FPV transmission ensures smooth and stable videos. Also easily share the happy moments stored on your phone or SD card to your social media platforms.

【GPS Auto return】Enjoy worry-free flying with GPS and automatic return functions. The drone features precise GPS positioning that will return smartly when it is lost signal, out of range or low power, never have to worry about flying it away, which ensure a safer and more reliable flying experience whether indoor or outdoor. In addition, the "HK55 DRONE GO" app can help to find the location of the mini drone on the map, never lose your drone.

【Hands Free Get Creative Shooting】The GPS drones with camera for adults 2K does the flying and filming for you! Functions like Follow Me, Waypoint Flight, Point of Interest and Gesture Selfie can not only enhance the flying experience, but give you more freedom to record the creative moments around you. our GPS drone is the ideal choice for shooting your sport moment such as hiking, skateboarding, surfing, camping, climbing, riding, running.

【Long Flight Time & Brushless Drone】The mini drone is equipped with two modular batteries, providing an 32 minutes of super long flight time. It makes you enjoy worry-free flying, capture and explore more of the adventure. The FPV drone uses powerful brushless motor for smoother flight, faster speeds, lower noise, and longer lifespan compared to brushed motor, delivering outstanding performance across various environments.

【Beginner-Friendly】 With features such as one-button take off/landing, headless mode, and two speed-switching functions make it easy for kids, beginners or newbies to control this drone with 2K camera. In addition, the drone with camera for adults is equipped with an GPS and Optical Flow hover, ensuring stable hovering in the sky. Whether you are a beginner or a skilled player, our drone bring you a excellent flight experience.

【Ultra-lightweight, No FAA or Remote ID Registration Required】The camera drone weighs less than 250 grams, not requiring FAA or Remote ID registration. Additionally, the foldable design and dedicated storage case make it more convenient to take the rc drone outdoors, letting you easily and enjoyably experience the thrill of outdoor flight whether you are traveling, camping or hiking! We would keep improving the functions of HK55 GPS drone to help you enjoy the ever-improving flight experience and shooting quality. Contact BLINORY anytime if you have any drone issues. BLINORY support is always available to assist you with the drone issue.

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
World-class specs, fits in your pocket. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
The future is here, and it fits in your pocket. Introducing EXO Mini Pro, a complete redefinition of what's possible of a drone of this class. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Shoot professional 4K video, easily. 
4K HDR 200mbps Video 

Shooting 4K UHD video at 200mbps, the video output from Mini Pro is packed full with color data and is balanced in exposure, providing you cinema-grade video capture. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Striking clarity, sharpness, and deep color. 
Sony 1/1.3in CMOS Sensor 

The striking clarity, sharpness, and deep color in EXO Mini's shots come from the massive 1/1.3in CMOS Sony imaging sensor. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Perfect moments don’t need perfect light. 
HDR, Night Mode, & f/1.8 Aperture 

Your perfect moments don’t need perfect light. With HDR, variable aperture, and f/1.85-f/12, you can shoot professionally exposed images, no matter the lighting conditions. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
So much detail. 
48-megapixel 

The gorgeous 48-megapixel camera on EXO Mini Pro gives you crisp detail and incredible image information, even when you’re zoomed in. With a 1/1.3in CMOS sensor and f/1.85 aperture, you can capture your shots with deeper color, clearer dynamic range, and with more image information. 
Easy Set Up, Easier Controls 
Simplicity 

Never touched a drone? No problem! Mini’s setup & controls are designed to be mastered by anybody, with any experience level. Being <250g, it’s also 100% legally compliant meaning no drone registrations required. 
Unprecedented Quadcopter Power 
5+ Mile Range 
Powered by Syncleas 3.0, your transmission range runs uninterrupted for miles. 
40 Minute Flight Time 
Fly with an industry-leading flight time, for up to 42 minutes on a single charge. 
Level 5 Wind Resistance 
Power through fierce 20 MPH winds, allowing you to take your drone more places than ever before. 
3-Way Collision Avoidance 
Because trees and drones don't mix. 3-way obstacle sensing stops EXO Mini Pro from crashing, avoiding obstacles as they come. 
Shoot dynamic video motions, completely hands free.

features: 【Ultimate Fusion: 4K HD Camera, Image Stabilization, and FPV】This drone with camera features a 130° wide-angle 4K lens and 90° adjustable view, ensuring every moment is captured in high definition. 【Brushless Drones: Stability, Efficiency, Wind Resistance】Compared to brushed models, brushless drones with camera for adults 4k offer longer lifespan and greater stability, using less power. They eliminate overheating issues and excel in high-speed conditions while resisting wind for stable flights.

【Experience Unmatched Safety】Designed with safety in mind, this drone for kids 10-12 features a child lock to prevent accidental takeoffs and propeller guards for safe indoor flying. The Anti-Lost Alarm activates after 10 minutes of inactivity, and low battery alerts plus an emergency stop function help avoid accidents.

【Dual-Battery Upgrade: Longer Flight, More Portable】The mini drone offers up to 28 minutes of flight time with its dual enhanced batteries. It charges quickly with USB 3.0 technology, and its foldable design plus storage box make it portable. Safety features like Overcharge and Short Circuit Protection give peace of mind during use.

【Multifunctional Control Experience】Convenient, Safe, and Flexible Operation: In addition to remote control, this camera drone supports app and voice control for convenience. title: Mini Drone with Camera - Drones for Kids Adults, 1080P HD Foldable Drone with Stable Hover, Auto-Follow, Trajectory Flight, Gravity Control, 90° Adjustable Lens, One Key Take Off/Land, 3D Flip
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Multiple Functions Drone: Based on the newest upgraded chip than others, our drone has multiple interesting functions. Such as trajectory flight, gravity control, 3D flip, headless mode, 3 speeds mode, one-key takeoff/landing, gesture photo, and even VR! Whether you're a beginner or a skilled player, our drone promises an enjoyable flying adventure. (Some functions are controlled by the app.) It is also a great present for birthdays and holidays.

1080P FPV & Electric Adjustable Camera: This Oddire drone equips an HD 1080P camera, which assists you in catching every wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective. The camera angle can be adjusted remotely up to 90 degrees. Combined with the upgraded hover system and optical flow positioning technology, the camera drone is more stable when shooting. You can enjoy a real-time panoramic view, and share them on your social media with ease.

Stable Hover & User Friendly: Equipped with an Optical Flow Positioning Camera, the drone has a more stable hover altitude ability, just calibrate it before takeoff (Turn on the drone, place it on flat ground, and move both joysticks inwards 45 degrees at the same time). Super suit for beginners! One-key takeoff/landing function can help users to start flying easily, the altitude hold feature allows the drone to hover in the air.

Long Battery Life & Cool Controller: With two rechargeable drone batteries, this drone extends the flight time to approximately 25-28 minutes, providing a worry-free flying experience. Features with over-current protection and an emergency stop to ensure a safe and reliable flight. The Controller is so cool and gives you a familiar pleasure like dominating the game.

APP & Connection: Download the APP "ODDIRE GO". Place the drone on the ground, then turn on the drone and controller(they will connect automatically). Open the mobile phone's wifi list, look for the wifi starting with "ODDIRE_X-28_XXXXXX", and connect directly. The photos & videos will be saved to your phone directly, don't need an SD card, convenient and economical. If you suffer any problems, please contact us and we will help you within 24 hours.

Tip1: Put the drone on the ground, turn it on, and then short press to turn on the remote control, they will automatically connect. Then open the mobile phone wifi list, search and connect to the wifi named "Oddire_XXX". Then move the two joysticks of the remote control inward at a 45-degree angle to complete the horizontal calibration (so that the drone can fly more steadily).

Tips2: Press the one-touch takeoff button on the remote control to take off(Please fully charge the battery, 90 minutes). Please click on the phone settings in advance to allow the APP to obtain camera permissions, so that you can see the drone camera screen on the phone. The blades of the drone are divided into two directions: A and B. Please make sure that they are in the right direction before taking off.

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Previous page

1 BEGINNER FRIENDLY 2 HEADLESS MODE 3 Full Protection Flight 4 3D FLIP 5 VR FUNCTION 
Full Function Experience 	You can experience one key take-off/landing, trajectory flight, auto follow, gravity control, headless mode function, 360° flip function, even VR mode with our drone. 	
Frequency Alignment 	Place the drone on a horizontal surface, turn on the drone and remote controller in turn, they will automatically connect to the frequency. Then move the left and right joysticks inwards 45 degrees At the same time, when you hear a beep, the horizontal calibration is complete. 	
Gravity Control 	Select the gravity remote control mode on the mobile phone APP. At this time, the mobile phone acts as a plane, corresponding to the front, rear, left, and right of the drone. You can pan the drone horizontally by tilting the phone, just like playing a game. 	
Auto Follow Function 	Please use this function in a wide area, select this function on the mobile APP interface, and the drone will follow you. 	
Trajectory Flight 	Please use this function in a wide area. After selecting this function on the APP, draw a line on the app interface, and the drone will move parallel along this line (please draw a line with a small arc or a straight line the first time use it) 	
1080P HD WiFi Camera 	With a built-in 1080P high-definition FPV wifi camera, you can easily take vivid aerial photos and videos, and create an amazing impression of the sky. The photos and videos will be saved to your phone directly. 	
Stable Hover 	Equipped with the optical flowing positioning camera, the drone can positioned in the vertical direction, thereby improving the aircraft's hover stability. 	
Portable and Safe Design 	The foldable drones for adults can be carried around with a carrying case equipped for you. 25-28-minute flight(2 batteries), propeller guards, low battery warning, and emergency stop ensure the safety of the flight.

features: Perfect For Kids & Beginners: EXO has specifically designed this drone with user-friendly software, ensuring that even kids and beginners can easily operate a professional-grade drone. With intuitive controls and simplified flight modes, the EXO Recon Drone makes flying a breeze, allowing anyone to enjoy the thrill of aerial photography and videography.

Hi Resolution Photo & Video: Exo Recon Drone is a true visual marvel, offering world-class photo quality and cinema-quality video capabilities in one powerful device. Its 1/1.3in CMOS sensor and advanced features like HDR, f/1.85 aperture, and night mode ensure that your aerial photography reaches professional standards, capturing breathtaking moments with exceptional detail and clarity.

Comfortably Fly Indoors with Enhanced Safety: Exo Recon Drone provides a worry-free indoor flying experience with its propeller guards designed to prevent collisions with walls and other obstacles. Guards act as a protective barrier around the propellers, minimizing the risk of damage and ensuring the drone remains stable and controlled during indoor flights. Parents can have peace of mind knowing that their children can safely fly the drone indoors.

Unleash Your Aerial Acrobatics with One-Touch Flips and Stunts: Take your flying skills to the next level and impress your friends with the Exo Recon Drone's one-touch flips and stunts feature. With a simple press of a button, you can execute thrilling barrel rolls and 360-degree flips effortlessly. This feature adds an element of excitement and entertainment to your drone flying experience, allowing you to showcase impressive aerial acrobatics without the need for advanced piloting skills.

Included With Your Drone: Exo Recon Drone offers more than just a powerful aerial device. With your purchase, you'll receive free accessories that enhance your flying experience. Additionally, gain access to a free Part 107 course, which provides you with the knowledge and certification to fly commercially. With lifetime tech support and EXO repair service, you can fly with confidence, knowing that we're here to support you every step of the way.

title: Drones with Camera for Adults 4K, Brushless Motor Drone for Kids Beginners, FPV Foldable RC Quadcopter with 3 Batteries, 45 Mins Long Flight Time, Beyond-Range Loss Alert, Toys Gifts for Men Boys
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Ultra-Clear 4K UHD Camera: The PL-511 drone with camera features a 4K HD camera with a 120° wide-angle lens and a 90° adjustable lens. Combined with ultra-smooth FPV transmission, it offers an unparalleled immersive flying experience, capturing stunning 3840x2160P photos and 4K videos from any angle.

Super Long Flight Time: The drones for adults is equipped with three powerful modular batteries, providing an impressive 45 minutes of long flight time. This allows your drone to soar freely in the sky, capturing and exploring more of your surroundings. The UL-certified batteries support up to 500 charge-discharge cycles and feature USB-C/PD charging for safer and faster charging. Additionally, the foldable design and dedicated storage case make it more convenient to take the rc drone outdoors, letting you easily and enjoyably experience the thrill of outdoor flight!

Brushless Drones: Stable, efficient, wind-resistant: Compared to brushed models, brushless drones offer longer lifespan, more powerful propulsion, and enhanced flight stability, allowing propellers to achieve higher speeds and further bolstering wind resistance. Additionally, integrated with optical flow positioning technology and altitude holding systems, the drone ensure stable hovering at desired heights, delivering outstanding performance across various environments.

Beginners can Also Easily Fly: PLEGBLE 4K camera drone is tailored for beginners, and has a variety of interesting intelligence functions. Equipped with security functions such as one-key takeoff/landing, headless mode, height maintenance, and over-range loss alarm, allowing you to fly carefreely. With emergency stop and 360° flips function, 3 speed modes: high/medium/low, rc drone opened a seamless adventure experience. Whether you are a beginner or a skilled player, our drone can bring you a happy flight experience.

Beyond-Range Loss Prevention Alarm System: The Beyond-range alarm system continuously monitors the position of the drone, ensuring a safer and more reliable flying experience whether indoors or outdoors. The out-of-range alarm (328-393 feet) provides users with control boundaries, minimizing the risk of drone loss. However, it is important to note that when flying outdoors, it is recommended to use the second or third speed mode to prevent the drome from getting lost.

Ultra-lightweight, No FAA or Remote ID Registration Required: PLEGBLE PL511 is an motor drone with 4K camera, featuring the latest design and weighing less than 250 grams. This FPV drone is the perfect solution for worry-free flying in the United States, requiring no FAA or remote ID registration. It's the ideal choice for capturing wonderful shots anytime.

PLEGBLE Elevating Your Drone Experience: Enhance your flying and shooting quality with the enhanced features of the PL511 drone. Maximize its potential through detailed video tutorials and instructions. Need assistance during rc drone operation? Reach out to our customer support for immediate problem-solving.

How long can the PL-511 drone fly? 
The kit includes three batteries, each supporting 15 minutes of flight, extending the total flight time to 45 minutes. It also comes with a portable carrying case for convenience. 
What is the camera quality of this PL-511 drone? 
Our 4K UHD camera features image stabilization technology, higher bit rates, and optimized camera module for clearer visuals. Combined with ultra-smooth FPV transmission and adjustable 90° lens, it offers unprecedented immersive flying experience. 
What are the advantages of brushless motors? 
Compared to brushed drones, brushless drone motors offer stronger power, lower noise, stable flight, higher speed, and longer lifespan. They reduce the need for motor maintenance and ensure a more stable flight. 
How do I open the app to view the drone screen? 
1. Power on the drone. 
2. Open Wi-Fi settings on your phone/device and connect to the drone's Wi-Fi signal (PL-511 Drone-xxxxxx). 
3. Open the drone app, tap "Continue to connect to this Wi-Fi," then tap "Enter" to view.

title: Potensic ATOM SE GPS Drone with 4K EIS Camera, Under 249g, 62 Mins Flight, 4KM FPV Transmission, Brushless Motor, Max Speed 16m/s, Auto Return, Lightweight and Foldable Drone for Adults, Beginner
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥-𝟓 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞】ATOM SE drone weighs 𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝟐𝟒𝟗𝐠, 𝐧𝐨 𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐀𝐀& 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐃 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧. The fold-up design packs up small enough to fit in a jacket pocket. Built-in 𝐛𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫 makes the drone 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥-𝟓 𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐝 and fly stably.

【𝟒𝐊 𝐄𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫】The drone is equippied with a 𝟏/𝟑’’ 𝐂𝐌𝐎𝐒 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫. It can shoot 𝟏𝟐𝐌𝐏 photos and 𝟒𝐊@𝟑𝟎𝐟𝐩𝐬 HD video. The exclusive ShakeVanish tech helps to take more stable and smoother images within 118° FOV and a vertical +20° to -90° camera.

【𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲, 𝐒𝐮𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐅𝐥𝐲 𝐅𝐥𝐞𝐱𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥】SurgeFly flight control system provides 𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞 and 3 flight modes - 𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨, 𝐍𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐥, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭- allowing you to challenge your skills as you become an advanced pilot with flexible and easy flight control experience. In Sport Mode, the max speed can be up to 16m/s in 2.8s.

【𝟔𝟐 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝟐 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬】The ATOM SE 4K drone comes with 2 intelligent 2500mAh batteries, each Battery running up to 31 minutes, for a total of 𝟔𝟐 𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬. Fly more, charging less. Give you more freedom to record the creative moments around you.

【𝐏𝐢𝐱𝐒𝐲𝐧𝐜 𝟐.𝟎, 𝟒𝐊𝐦 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧】The control range is up to 𝟒𝐊𝐦/𝟏𝟑,𝟏𝟐𝟑𝐟𝐭. The PixSync 2.0 technology ensures stable, consistent video in most shooting conditions and enables low latency for HD digital video.

【𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐆𝐏𝐒 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧, 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢-𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬】The ATOM SE GPS drone will 𝐬𝐚𝐟𝐞𝐥𝐲 𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐨-𝐟𝐥𝐲 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤 to the take-off point when it's lost signal or is in low power. Easy to control for all levels. You can have even more fun with features like Follow Me, Waypoint Flight, and Circle Flight of the drone. Dive into more flying possibilities.
【𝐀𝐥𝐰𝐚𝐲𝐬 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠】 All firmware supports FOTA, we recommend keeping up to date with the latest firmware to enjoy the ever-improving flight experience and shooting quality.

【𝐊𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫】 ATOM SE is compatible with IOS 11 and Android 7.0 or above, and we offer 3 types of adapter cables (Micro/Type C/Lightning) to connect your phone and the remote control, you can choose the one you need.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
ATOM SE Expansion Kit -2 Batteries, 62mins Flight Time 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
SurgeFly: Speed Up to 16m/s in 2.8s 
Fast Takeoff with Brushless Motor 

The special ATOM SE SurgeFly supports fast takeoff, increases stability and reduces operational errors. In Sport mode, the speed of the drone can be increased from 0 to 2.8s to 16m/s. This means that the drone has a short reaction time and can catch up with faster dynamic objects. 
More Stable Transmission 
PixSync 2.0, 4km/13,123ft Transmission Range 

The 12MP camera delivers impressive image and video quality. Accompanied by 4K/30fps video and ShakeVanish technology for more stable and smooth aerial shots. 
The built-in PixSync 2.0 enables the ATOM SE to transmit up to 4km, giving you a wider view of this world. 
Lighter, Faster 
Scale 5 Wind Resistance 

Weighing less than 249g/0.55lbs, the ATOM SE drone is about the same as a smartphone and fits in your pocket. And in the United States and Canada, you can fly the ATOM SE camera drones without registration. 
ATOM SE can withstand scale 5 winds, so your footage is stable even when flying in windy conditions. 
GPS Auto Return 
One Key Back / Low Battery / Signal Loss 

When the signal is lost, the battery is low or the auto-return button is pressed, the ATOM SE drone will automatically return to the take-off position, without worrying about losing the drone, just enjoy the flight. 
High-precision GPS 
Follow Me / Waypoint Flight / Circle Flight 

Simply connect to the PotensicPro app with your phone, press the Circle Flight button in the app and set the radius and the drone will fly a circle around the target. 
To use the Waypoint feature, just set the route on the map and the drone will fly along the location you set. 
You can also use the Follow Me feature to have the drone automatically follow you. Dive into more possibilities

items.title: Fast Takeoff with Brushless Motor
items.subtitle: SurgeFly: Speed Up to 16m/s in 2.8s
items.text: The special ATOM SE SurgeFly supports fast takeoff, increases stability and reduces operational errors. In Sport mode, the speed of the drone can be increased from 0 to 2.8s to 16m/s. This means that the drone has a short reaction time and can catch up with faster dynamic objects.

items.title: PixSync 2.0, 4km/13,123ft Transmission Range
items.subtitle: More Stable Transmission
items.text:
The 12MP camera delivers impressive image and video quality. Accompanied by 4K/30fps video and ShakeVanish technology for more stable and smooth aerial shots. 
The built-in PixSync 2.0 enables the ATOM SE to transmit up to 4km, giving you a wider view of this world.

image.name: Potensic ATOM SE GPS Drone with 4K EIS Camera for Adults and Beginners

items.title: Scale 5 Wind Resistance
items.subtitle: Lighter, Faster
items.text:
Weighing less than 249g/0.55lbs, the ATOM SE drone is about the same as a smartphone and fits in your pocket. And in the United States and Canada, you can fly the ATOM SE camera drones without registration. 
ATOM SE can withstand scale 5 winds, so your footage is stable even when flying in windy conditions.

image.name: Potensic ATOM SE GPS Potensic ATOM SE GPS for Adults and Beginners

items.title: One Key Back / Low Battery / Signal Loss
items.subtitle: GPS Auto Return
items.text: When the signal is lost, the battery is low or the auto-return button is pressed, the ATOM SE drone will automatically return to the take-off position, without worrying about losing the drone, just enjoy the flight.

image.name: Potensic ATOM SE GPS Drone with 4K EIS Camera for Adults and Beginners

items.title: Follow Me / Waypoint Flight / Circle Flight
items.subtitle: High-precision GPS
items.text:
Simply connect to the PotensicPro app with your phone, press the Circle Flight button in the app and set the radius and the drone will fly a circle around the target. 
To use the Waypoint feature, just set the route on the map and the drone will fly along the location you set. 
You can also use the Follow Me feature to have the drone automatically follow you. Dive into more possibilities

features: 【𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐆𝐏𝐒 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧】Equipped with 𝐆𝐏𝐒 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, the GPS drone will 𝐬𝐚𝐟𝐞𝐥𝐲 𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐨-𝐟𝐥𝐲 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤 to the take-off point when it's lost signal or is in low power or whenever you press down auto return button.

【𝟏𝟎𝟖𝟎𝐏 𝐇𝐃 𝐅𝐏𝐕 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚】The drone is equipped with a 𝟏𝟎𝟖𝟎𝐏 𝐇𝐃 𝐜𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚. You can 𝐜𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐦𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 and view images on your phone from the 𝐰𝐢𝐝𝐞-𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐬. You can share them on social media through the App with ease.
【𝟐 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝟐𝟔 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭】The drone comes with 𝟐 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐚𝐫 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬, for a total of 𝟐𝟔 𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬. Control range is up to 𝟗𝟖𝟒𝐟𝐭. Give you more freedom to record the perfect moments around you.

【𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬】With the 𝐅𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰 𝐌𝐞, 𝐖𝐚𝐲𝐩𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐂𝐢𝐫𝐜𝐥𝐞 𝐟𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐟𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬, you can get the best shots anywhere. The drone will 𝐟𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲, 𝐟𝐥𝐲 𝐚𝐥𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐡 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐬𝐞𝐭 or 𝐟𝐥𝐲 𝐚𝐫𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐮𝐛𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐬𝐞𝐭. Dive into more flying possibilities.

【𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐬】The 𝐔𝐩𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝐀𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐭𝐮𝐝𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦 enables stable flight. This GPS drone equipped with smart functions such as 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐅𝐥𝐨𝐰, 𝐀𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐭𝐮𝐝𝐞 𝐇𝐨𝐥𝐝 provide 𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐡𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠; 𝐎𝐧𝐞 𝐤𝐞𝐲 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭/𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞, 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐀𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 let the drone beginners, kids, starters, or newbies control it easier!
