title: K417 Drone with Camera 1080p HD,90° Electric Adjustable Lens,Blue LED Lights AIdrones with Dual Cameras for Adults,Remote Control Quadcopter with Altitude Hold for Beginners,Gestures Selfie,Carry Case
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: K417 drone with 2 1080p cameras, with a resolution of 1920*1080p, offers excellent details and clarity, allowing for high-quality aerial photography. K417 drones' CMOS progressive scanning can achieve 1080p, and videos can recorded at a high frame rate of 30 frames per second, ensuring smooth viewing of video footage. The bottom camera can assist the pilot in monitoring the situation beneath the fpv drone in real-time, ensuring flight safety and meeting the requirements for multi-angle shooting.

K417 Drones with a front light that enhances visibility during nighttime flights, ensuring flight safety. Secondly, the light can help the drone with camera adults locate and navigate more easily in low-light environments. In addition, the light can also be used for signal transmission and communication, enhancing the functionality and application range of the mini drone. Therefore, the light can further play the role of the brushless drone and improve its overall performance and efficiency.

Optical flow positioning on K417 drones with camera for adults typically involves utilizing a bottom camera to gather image data, while the Inertial Attitude System (IAS) consistently captures surface images of objects at a specific frequency. FPV drone's digital signal processor (DSP) analyzes the generated image digital matrix and utilizes the optical flow algorithm to calculate the displacement between the two frames of images, enabling precise positioning of the drone with camera.

5GHz WiFi transmission can enable efficient and real-time data transfer, swiftly sending the images captured by K417 drone with camera to your mobile App, enhancing the speed and precision of data transmission. After multiple tests conducted by professionals, 5GHz WiFi test results indicate that the average speed is approximately 700 Mbps, with an upload speed of around 80 Mbps, which is ten times faster than 4G. It allows you to watch the images captured by FPV drone in real time more quickly.

K417 brushless motor Drone capable of reaching a max speed of 6000rpm. Brushless motors have no brushes, which leads to reduced friction and energy loss. They can respond to changes in torque more quickly, making them more efficient, easier to control, and have a longer lifespan. Brushless motors camera drone utilize high-quality magnets, coils and bearings, enabling it to maintain stable performance at high speeds and high loads, providing powerful thrust output and improved wind resistance.

You can download the K417 drone's app, connect directly to the quadcopter drone with camera through your phone, and use the interface on the phone screen to control the flight, which enhances the convenience of flying brushless drone. Unlock more flight features, such as one-key takeoff/landing, 3-speed modes, 3D flips, gesture control, etc. You can also draw the desired flight route on the app, and drone with camera will execute trajectory flight, enhancing overall operational intelligence.

K417 Drone with a stylish carrying case that enables users to carry it out more conveniently. It can effectively protect the drone with camera from collisions, dust, rain, and other factors. Minimize the instances of brushless drones becoming unusable due to improper storage. The carrying case is designed with multiple pockets, allowing users to store the K417 drone, remote control, spare propellers, batteries, and others in separate compartments for convenient organization and management.

Foldable design of K417 drone makes it more flexible, convenient and practical in various scenarios. It helps to protect drones and avoid damage during transportation. The drone with camera for adults weighs less than 249g, so even if you don't have an FAA or United flight certificate, you don't need to go through the cumbersome registration process, allowing you to enjoy the fun of flying more easily. This type of brushless drone is usually suitable for beginners to practice flying skills.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
NX525 Drone with Camera for Kids and Adults 
1080P Full HD Camera 
With the 1080P HD camera connected to your phone, you can experience the world right before your eyes. 60° adjustable can be adjusted by hand before the flight, allows you to shoot more angles of sight. 
FPV Real-time Transmission 
You can experience high-speed real-time image transmission. Just one click on your APP, share images with your friends. 
Gesture Photography 
Post a "V" sign to take photos or make a "Plam" gesture to record videos. No need to operate buttons to shoot. Nice features of the fpv drones! 
Multiple Fun Flight with NX525 RC Drone 
Gravity Sensor Mode 
The gravity sensor mode enables the drone to follow the direction you move your smartphone. You can make the flight more interesting. 
Custom Flight Path 
You can draw a route on the App screen and the drone will fly following the path accordingly. Easy and fun flight experience! 
(This function only can be activated when you disconnect the controller.) 
360 Degree Flips 
Just click the 3D ROLL button to activate 360-degree stunt tumbling action. Highly responsive function! 
3 Speeds Mode 
3 speeds mode(low/medium/high) makes this super friendly and funny to newbies and experts. Even try switching different speed modes when the drone is in flight for more fun. 
NX525 Upgraded Drone with Camera 
Double Batteries, Double Fun 
The drone comes with 2 batteries, supports up to 26 minutes long flight time. 
Upgraded Durable Motor 
Equip with an upgraded powerful motor, makes the quadcopter drones flight stronger and more stable than others. The ability of wind resistance is also improved, great for outdoor use.

Product Description

3 Speeds Mode:
3 speeds mode(low/medium/high) makes this super friendly and funny to newbies and experts. Even try switching different speed modes when the drone is in flight for more fun.
Trajectory Flight
The tap fly allows the drone to fly along the route you designed. You can enjoy a completely new flying experience at the touch of your fingertip.
Gravity Control
Enable to control the direction of your drone with camera by moving your phone accordingly, great smart-sensing feature!
Foldable and Portable
It's very exquisite, small and smart, makes it a favorite toy and a photography shooting gadget.Comes with a handbag, exquisite and compact, easy to carry.
Headless Mode
Make the drone's front side the same as the remote control, you can easier fly the drone without worrying about what direction it is facing, especially when it is far away.

Optical flow sensor provides altitude hold and position hold, hovers the drone steadily at a certain height, prevents it drifting and helps to take selfies easily, to help you get it start quickly and safely.

Product Description

Drone in Your Pocket 	Unveil the X200W's super-miniature design at just 2.4*2.4*1.2 inches (folded) and 6.1*5.5*1.2 inches (unfolded) – a pocket-sized drone with incredible capabilities. 	
Stunning 720P Aerial Views 	The X200W comes equipped with a fixed 720P camera, delivering breathtaking real-time aerial photos and videos, capturing every moment of your flight with precision and clarity. 	
Long-Lasting Adventure 	With its built-in 400mAh high-capacity battery, the X200W outlasts the competition, offering an impressive 16-minute flight time on a single charge—more fun, less downtime! 	
Precise Control with Trimming 	The X200W offers exceptional flight precision through its trimming feature. Fine-tune your drone's orientation effortlessly, ensuring stable and accurate flight control in any conditions. 	
Effortless Altitude Hold 	The X200W effortlessly maintains a stable altitude, ensuring smooth, hands-free flight for an easy and enjoyable flying experience. 	
3D Flips 	The X200W delivers jaw-dropping aerial stunts with its 3D roll feature，making impressive mid-air maneuvers as easy as pressing a button. 	
Two Speed Mode 	Tailor your flight experience with the X200W's two-speed settings, allowing both beginners and experts to enjoy versatile and exciting flying modes. 	
Track Flight Mode 	Explore hands-free flying with the X200W's track flight feature, letting you draw a path on your device, and the drone will follow it effortlessly, unlocking creative and automated aerial journeys. 	
Gravity Sensing 	Control your X200W intuitively with gravity sensing technology. Tilt your device to guide the drone's movements, making flying a breeze for all ages. 	
Immersive VR Mode 	Dive into a virtual world with the X200W's VR mode, offering an immersive flying experience through compatible virtual reality headsets, adding a new dimension to your aerial adventures.

POWERFUL CONFIGURATION 
1 4K Camera 2 Brushless Motor 3 5GHz WiFi 4 ＜249g No Need FAA 
MORE FUNCTIONS 
Previous page
Next page
Can beginners fly this drone? 
In the case of signal loss or low battery, the drone will automatically return back to the take-off point, which makes more friendly for beginners in use. So there's not much you need to worry about like losing the drone. 
Why can't the drone take off? 
Before take-off, you need to follow the steps in the manual to calibrate the drone outdoors. After successful calibration, place the drone outside and wait for the drone to finish searching for satellites, you can start to take off the drone. 
Why can't the drone take off indoors? 
The drone cannot search for satellites indoors. If you want to take off indoors, please press the return button to switch the drone to indoor mode, then the drone can take off in indoor mode. 
Why is the flight direction of the drone inconsistent with the commands issued by the remote control? 
Please switch on headless mode or keep the nose of the drone always forward. In this case, the drone will always follow the direction command of the remote control to fly. 
What are there in the box？ 
1 X TL16 GPS Drone, 1 X Remote Control, 1 X Long Life Drone Battery, 4 X Drone Propellers, 1 X Battery USB Cable, 1 X Tools, 1 X Carrying Case

Dual Battery Design for Extended Fun – 16 Minutes of Flight: Equipped with two rechargeable batteries, this kid drone provides up to 16 minutes of flying time. More playtime means more fun! Perfect for hobby RC quadcopters & multirotors enthusiasts

The Ultimate Gift for Kids – Fun, Educational, and Exciting: This drone for kids is the perfect choice for birthdays, Halloween,Christmas, or any special occasion. A remote control drone that combines fun with learning, it’s a fantastic stem toy that will bring smiles to children's faces.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Previous page
Next page
How to make the drone follow the instructions accurately?Gyro calibration 
Please ensure that the drone and remote control are calibrated before takeoff, as detailed in the manual. Please read it carefully. 
How do I use the 3D flip function, and why doesn’t it work with low battery? 
Press the "3D Flip" button and choose a direction. If the battery is low, flips may not work. Recharge to continue. 
!!!--How do I calibrate the drone after startup or a crash? 
After starting up or a crash, hold the left joystick downward to the left and the right joystick downward to the right. The lights will flash green to indicate successful calibration. Only calibrate when the drone is on the ground. 
How do I know when the drone's battery is low? 
When the battery is running low, the drone's red LED lights will start blinking, signaling that it’s time to land and recharge or replace the battery. 
Can I fly the drone outdoors when it's windy? 
It’s not recommended to fly the drone outdoors in windy conditions, as strong winds can make it hard to control and may lead to crashes or loss. For best results, fly indoors or in calm weather.

A Good Gift! 
A13 Drone 
New Appearance Design 	Different from other drone shell designs, it adopts a carbon fiber shell design, which is different and makes the drone more resistant to falling. 	
Easy to Carry 	Equipped with a storage bag, and the overall weight of the drone is less than 160g 	
4K high-definition Dual Camera 	4K camera and 90° manually adjustable lens, increase the top-down angle shooting by switching the button, allowing you to enjoy real-time and vivid aerial photos and videos 	
Stable Altitude Hold 	After taking off, please allow 3-5 seconds for the light flow to stabilize. Once stable, the drone will automatically enter hover mode, maintain a stable altitude and remain stationary. This ensures you a stable and controlled flying experience. 	
Long Flight 	2 batteries are provided for use, which can be used for up to 30 minutes (if you use the one-button roll mode, the roll function will consume a lot of power, and it is recommended to use this function in an open space) 	
One-key Takeoff/Landing 	Easily start or land, just tap this function and it will automatically take off and keep flying or slowly fly down. 	
One Click to Scroll 	Tap one button, then the drone will perform a 360 flip making the flight more exciting. 	
Emergency Stop 	This mode is for emergency stop if there is a danger during the flight 	
Protection Mechanism 	To ensure the safety of the drone, we have equipped the drone with a mechanism that automatically activates when it flies beyond a certain remote control range. Once the drone reaches this limit, it will automatically hover in place, preventing it from flying further and preventing it from getting lost. 	
Reliable Flying Partner 	We recommend conducting your first flight in an open area.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
AMERFIST Magic Flying Levitating Ball Can Take You Much More Fun 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Endless Fun of the Basic Flying Gameplay 
Straight Flight 
Hold the flying orb ball (keeping it horizontal and parallel to the ground), tilt it downwards at 30° angle then throw it 
Fly Like a Boomerang 
Grip the flying orb,tilt it upwards at a 30° angle, then throw it. Watch as the flying toy gracefully returns to your hand in its original direction 
Hover Ball 
Watch in awe as the magic ball floats in the air and follows the movement of your hand. It's like magic, and that's the enchantment of flying orb ball 
Turning Flying 
Watch in amazement as the fly orb ball flies out in a curved trajectory and then returns to another target position along the same path 
Creativity and Achievements with Advanced Level Skills 
Outside in 
Throw the mini flying orb ball towards the outer side, and it will curve outward in the air before suddenly turning inward 
Inside Out 
The flying orb ball toy will curve inward in the air before suddenly turning outward 
Air Bounce 
The small flying orb ball will bounce in the air, flying to another person's hand 
High Release 
Give the flying orb ball upward force, causing it to rise higher in the air before descending and flying to a teammate's hand 
Let your creativity "take flight"! You'll definitely explore more amazing flying modes and experience pure joy that's all yours

features: 1080P HD Camera Adjustable FPV Drone & APP Control-- Equipped with an adjustable-angle 1080P HD camera, this drone is capable of capturing stunning aerial photos and videos, recording your life's moments. Use the "Velcase VGO" app to connect and control the drone, and watch real-time video feed through FPV technology, allowing you to explore distant landscapes or capture unforgettable moments from the sky, then share them with your friends on social media.Photo/video with gestures automatically.

Multiple Functions for Kids Beginners--Features: optical flow positioning, barometric altitude hold, 3D flips, headless mode, three-speed modes, one-key takeoff/landing/return/emergency stop, 360° flips, trajectory flight, gesture photo/video, voice control, and low battery warning make it extremely beginner-friendly and suitable for kids. Foldable Drone, Full Accessories, Thoughtful design-- The package includes a portable bag for convenient outdoor travel. The one-key 360° flip adds more fun. This drone can fly along a pre-set path or orbit around a point. When you strike a pose in front of the camera, it will take photos or record videos.

Professional Flight Partner After Sales Guarantee-- We recommend installing the propeller guards for the first flight in an open area. For product-related issues, we provide 24-hour technical support and refund services to all customers. breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Flying Quadcopter & Jumping Car: Fly this mini drone in the air or drive it on land. The 2 wheels enables it to drive smoothly on land. Besides, you can make it do jumping to avoid obstacles ahead and do drifting to add extra fun!

Standing “Driver” on the Car: A little block doll is attached on the top of the quadcopter. That can be detached when you don’t need it. The drone light to help you tell direction at night can be turned off to save power when you don’t need it.

Easy to Control: Take it off in one second by one key take-off/land button. Thanks to altitude hold, it will stay hovering when you don’t make any command. Headless mode can help you tell the direction easily. If the drone drifts to one side, you can make it balanced by one key calibration or trimmer button. If there is any emergency, you can stop it immediately to avoid injury or damage by pressing emergency stop button.

Circle Fly and 360° Flip: Simply press down the buttons, you can make it fly in a circle or do flips in the desired direction. One battery lasts 7-9 minutes and the package includes 2 batteries; if you frequently use circle fly or 360° Flip, the battery will run out quickly.

2.4Ghz Indoor Toy: The control range of this 2.4Ghz remote toy is up to 98feet/30meters. If you have several 2.4Ghz remote toys, they can be used at the sames without interference with each other. This is a good toy to bring laughter to your family when it’s cold or hot and you have to stay indoors. Note: this won’t have a good performance if you fly it outdoors since it’s not wind-resistant.

features: ✈1080P HD FPV Camera: Front 1080P HD ESC camera, 90°adjustable angle, can provide smooth FPV transmission within 100m (328 feet) range, you can see the real-time first-person-view on the phone app. The bottom is equipped with a 720P camera to switch the viewing angle freely, which can perfectly realize the aerial photography function and easily capture large scenes.

✈Friendly for Beginners: Optical flow positioning allows the bottom camera to accurately capture the ground or any object, keeping the drone in a hovering state. The precise locking height allows the drone to stably capture wonderful pictures and videos, which is very suitable for adults, beginners and photographers.

✈Automatic Obstacle Avoidance: Three-way automatic obstacle avoidance function. When turned on, mini drone has the ability to perceive the front, left and right directions. Mini drone can perceive the distance of obstacles and avoid them in advance. When turn on it, the speed of the camera drone will become slower and the fast speed mode will turn off temporary.So recommended to fly indoors when using this mode.

✈Multiple Fun Flight: Drone with camera has multiple functions: 360° flip, fixed-point flight, gravity control, gesture photography, one-key take-off and landing, headless mode, three-way automatic obstacle avoidance function. The simple operation makes it very easy for beginners to use, and the LED light makes the flight more spectacular.

✈30Mins Flight with 2 Batteries: The foldable mini drone can be stored in a handbag and taken out at any time, perfect for travel and outdoor activities. Two 1800mAh batteries (each can fly for 15 mins), provides 30 minutes of flight time and endless fun, easy to replace, plug and play. Any question, please be free to contact us.

✈Note: Calibration is required before each use: push the left stick up and down to link the drone, then push both sticks to bottom left/right. It is recommended that beginners use it indoors before outdoors. When outdoors, please go to an open area to avoid interference. Plaese be careful not to fly too far to avoid losing control.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
NOTE: Calibration is required before each use. It is recommended that beginners use it indoors before outdoors. When outdoors, please go to an open area to avoid interference. Plaese be careful not to fly too far to avoid losing control. 
Waypoints Fly 
Draw the flight path you want on the app, and the drone can fly automatically, without button control, fun and interesting. 
Altitude Hold 
The optical flow positioning technology allows the drone to maintain a high altitude and hover stably without any operation. It is easy to use and very suitable for beginners. 
Headless Mode 
Make the drone's front side the same as the remote control, you can easier fly the drone without worrying about what direction it is facing, especially when it is far away. 
Automatic Obstacle Avoidance Mode 
This drone has front, left and right three-way environmental perception capabilities, infrared obstacle avoidance sensing, so that you no longer worry about collisions, falls, etc. It is very suitable for beginners to use. 
Fast / Slow Speed Modes 
It is very interesting for beginners to switch between fast and slow files through key operation. Feel the joy of speed and passion by changing the speed of the drone in flight. 
One Key Take Off/Landing 
Easy to operate, you can take off the drone with just one button, and wherever the drone is flying, it can be returned with just one button. This is the best gift as a birthday present. 
360° 3D Flip 
Fly the drone to a height over 2 meters, press the 3D Flip button and move the front/rear/left/right control stick to flip the drone 360° accordingly, provide stunt aerial show. 
Gravity Control 
Gravity induction, allowing you to control the trajectory of the drone in the air through the mobile phone's gravity induction, increasing the wireless fun of flying. 
Gesture Control 
Face the camera and make a "YEAH" gesture in the distance of 2-3m between you and the camera, the camera takes a photo automatically; when you make a "PLAM" gesture, the camera starts recording.

title: DJI Air 3 (DJI RC-N2), Drone with Medium Tele & Wide-Angle Dual Primary Cameras, 46-Min Max Flight Time, Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing, 48MP Photos, 4K/60fps HDR, Compliance with FAA Remote ID

description: DJI Air 3 comes in three purchasing options: -DJI Air 3 (DJI RC-N2) is the standard option and includes the drone, DJI RC-N2 remote controller, and other items for new users to get started quickly. -DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo (DJI RC-N2) includes the drone, RC-N2, three Intelligent Flight Batteries, a Battery Charging Hub, and more. -DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo (DJI RC 2) includes the drone, three Intelligent Flight Batteries, a Battery Charging Hub, and more, as well as the new DJI RC 2, which offers a bright touchscreen and the DJI Fly app pre-installed for an exceptional operating experience. Notes * Please check and strictly abide by local laws and regulations before flying. ** All data was tested using a production model DJI Air 3 in a controlled environment. Actual experience may vary depending on the environment, usage, and firmware version. *** All videos and images on this page were shot in strict compliance with relevant local laws and regulations. **** Before use, DJI Air 3 must be activated via the DJI Fly app. 1. The wide-angle camera and 3x medium tele camera have different apertures. 2. The obstacle avoidance action should be set to Bypass in the app. 3. Measured by DJI Air 3 flying at a constant speed of 28.8 kph in a windless environment at sea level, with APAS off, AirSense off, camera parameters set to 1080p/24fps, video mode off, and from 100% battery level until 0%. Data is for reference only. Always pay attention to reminders in the app during flight. 4. DO NOT connect the charger, connect external devices, or insert/remove any batteries when using the power accumulation function. 5. The 3x medium tele camera does not support the Asteroid QuickShot. Please check the "Product guides and documents" for the full version of these notes.
features: 𝗖𝗮𝗽𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗕𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝘁𝗮𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴, 𝗜𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗦𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 - DJI Air 3's dual cameras offer creative focal-length options ideal for travel photography. Show off stunning environments and tell captivating stories through your lens.

𝗙𝗔𝗔 𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲 𝗜𝗗 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗮𝗻𝘁 - DJI Air 3 complies with the FAA Remote ID rule. Please check the compliance document below to see the user guide for Remote ID, and you can visit the FAA's website for requirements of drone registration and Remote ID.
𝗘𝗻𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆, 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗿𝘆-𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗙𝗹𝘆𝗶𝗻𝗴 - Fly confidently with Air 3's 𝗼𝗺𝗻𝗶𝗱𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗼𝗯𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴. It ensures comprehensive protection even in challenging environments like forests.
𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝟰𝟴𝗠𝗣 𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵-𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗖𝗿𝗼𝗽𝘀 - Air 3 captures impressive 48MP images, allowing for remarkable crops. Even quickly snapped travel photos can be cropped to reveal surprising details.
𝗜𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗙𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗥𝗶𝗰𝗵 𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗹𝘀 - Record stunning 4K/60fps HDR videos with the dual cameras. Experience breathtaking visuals with vibrant colors and lifelike details.

𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗢𝟰 𝗛𝗗 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗺𝗶𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗦𝗺𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗙𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀 - The six-antenna array significantly improves video transmission. Enjoy a stable 1080p/60fps live feed 𝘂𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝟮𝟬 𝗸𝗺, ensuring smooth flights with clear and reliable transmission.

Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. To ensure a better product usage experience, please log in to the DJI official website to download the latest version of DJI Fly.
With DJI Goggles Integra, DJI Goggles 2, and DJI RC Motion 2, Air 3 is primed to give you an exhilarating first-person flight experience.
* 𝗕𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗲𝗿 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝗱 𝘀𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆. It is recommended to purchase the DJI 65W Portable Charger or DJI 100W USB-C Power Adapter.
Firmware Update - The new Vision Assist feature provides visual assistance and improved aerial safety in four directions, and the new ActiveShots 360° delivers enhanced subject-tracking capabilities.

aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
DJI Air 3 | Dual-Camera Drone for Travel Photography 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.

Previous page

1 Advanced Sensing 2 Extended Battery 3 Updated Charging Hub 4 O4 Transmission 
Easily Epic: Intelligent Features 
Vision Assist, Compose with Confidence 

Air 3 can provide real-time views from the front, back, left, and right. Whether executing camera movements like circling and pulling away, using the medium tele camera, or capturing nighttime shots, this feature empowers you to maintain full awareness of the surroundings and create with more confidence. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
ActiveShots 360°, Your Aerial Photographer [8] 

Creative aerial shots have never been easier thanks to Air 3's ActiveShots 360° feature. When paired with the omnidirectional vision sensing system and 3x medium tele camera, it enables you to capture cinematic footage that keeps your subject in focus. Try Manual mode to customize your flight path with a subject centered, or Auto mode for automatically planned flight paths. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
QuickShots 

Both cameras suport QuickShots like Rocket, Dronie, Circle, Helix, Boomerang. [7] Asteroid is not supported when using the medium tele camera. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
MasterShots 

This feature automatically shoots multiple angles and shots and edits footage with music for an instantly cinematic and shareable video of any location. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Timelapse & Hyperlapse 

Both cameras support 4K horizontal timelapse video and 2.7K cropped vertical timelapse video. Hyperlapse offers multiple modes like Free, Course Lock, Circle, and Waypoint. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
One-Tap Edits with LightCut 

Use the LightCut app to apply amazing special effects to your shots with just one tap, giving you effortlessly eye-catching footage. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.

title: Mini Drone with Camera,1080P HD FPV Foldable Drones for Kids,Adults,Gesture Control, Stable Altitude Hold, One Key Take Off/Land, 3D Flips, Waypoints Fly, Gravity Control, Kids Drone,2 Batteries
inStockText: Only 19 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: ✈【Easy-to-Fly 】The mini drone with camera is designed for ease of use featuring multiple functions as Altitude Hold, Headless Mode, and One Key Take-off/Landing,optical flow 3D flips, two-speed modes,emergency stop, 360° flips, trajectory flight, gesture photo/video, low battery warning make the operation is easy and fun,it extremely user-friendly and suitable for beginners,it's the ideal Christmas gifts for boys and girls,wonderful gift for new year ,romantic gifts for your boyfriend,girlfriend.

✈【1080P HD Camera】1080P HD Camera - Equipped with a 1080P HD 90° adjustable lens, combined with the hover system and optical flow positioning technology, our camera drone is more stable when shooting. It assists you to catch the wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective. Using the "EEFPV" app and FPV transmission, Enjoy the thrill of exploring distant landscapes while flying, you can enjoy live 1080P HD pictures and videos and easily share with your friends and family.

✈【Compact and Portable】 Designed with portability in mind,our palm drone weights less 55 grams,this mini drone with foldable arms and lightweight construction enable you to pack your drone conveniently and take it wherever your journey leads.Whether for indoor or outdoor use, our drones are the ideal companion for capturing stunning aerial imagery on the go.it is an excellent toy gift for both kids and adults ,boys and girls or even beginners.

✈【Safety and Reliability】 Enhanced with a comprehensive outer casing that fully encloses all four propellers, reducing the risk of injuries and ensuring durability against impacts. Its Return-to-Home function can guiding the drone back to its takeoff point or ensuring a safe landing in the event of low battery. The Emergency Stop feature provides the immediate control needed to halt the drone's flight when faced with any issues, giving you confidence in a secure and dependable flying experience.

✈【Altitude Hold & Optical Flow】The hovering system and optical flow positioning technology ensure a more stable and controllable flight, keeping the drone at a certain height and capturing high-quality photos and videos,Optical Flow is a technology that allows drones to track their position and movement by analyzing visual cues from the environment, crucial for stable flight and navigation, especially in GPS-denied areas

✈【Gesture Photo and Video】Gesture Photo and Video lets you control drone cameras with hand gestures, enhancing the interactive flying experience. Ideal for hands-free capturing of images and videos, this feature is perfect for adults and makes a great gift. It's a high-tech, user-friendly option that adds convenience and fun during drone flying .This feature makes capturing pictures easy and fun, perfect for kids who love to take selfies with their drone.

✈【One Key Take-off /Landing】One Key Take-off/Landing is a convenient feature for the little drone, This function allows for effortless launching into the air and smooth landings with just a single button press on the remote control quadcopter, It's perfect for beginners, ensuring a stress-free flying experience and reducing the likelihood of crashes often associated with manual take-offs and landings. This feature making it user-friendly and accessible for all skill levels

✈【Headless Mode】Headless Mode on foldable FPV drones with HD cameras simplifies flying by aligning controls with the pilot's view instead of the drone's nose. This intuitive feature is perfect for beginners and aerial photography, as it lets you focus on framing without tracking the drone's direction. It boosts safety and control, making these drones enjoyable for all levels,especially suitable for beginners. Make it as an ideal Birthday or Christmas gift for kids or friends.

✈【3D Flip &Waypoint Fly】 3D Flip allows the drone to perform acrobatic flips in any direction with the push of a button, adding a dynamic element to flight. Waypoint Fly, on the other hand, enables pilots to plot a flight path on a map, and the drone will follow this route autonomously, perfect for capturing cinematic shots or surveying areas with accuracy. These features blend entertainment with functionality, making the smart drone flying more engaging and efficient.

✈【Excellent After-sales Service and Quality Assurance】Equipped with spare propellers, when the propeller falls off or is damaged, you can easily replace it yourself; Each drone is equipped with two batteries, if you need additional batteries, you can purchase them separately. We provide a 12-month warranty. If you meet any quality problems that are not artificially damaged, you can contact customer service at any time.

【1080P FPV Image & Video and 90° Electric Adjustable Camera】: Our RADCLO drone is equipped with an HD 1080P camera, which assists you in catching every wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective. The camera angle can be adjusted remotely up to 90 degrees. Combined with the upgraded hover system and optical flow positioning technology, the camera drone is more stable when shooting. You can enjoy a real-time panoramic view, and share them on your social media with ease.

【Multiple Functions Drone】: Based on the newest upgraded chip on the market, our drone has multiple interesting functions. Such as 3D flip, headless mode, trajectory flight, gravity control, auto-follow function, 3 speeds mode, one key takeoff/landing, gesture photo, and even VR! Whether you're a beginner or a skilled player, our drone promises an enjoyable flying adventure. 【Long Battery Life & Cool Remote Control】: With two rechargeable drone batteries, this kid's drone extends the flight time to approximately 25-30 minutes, providing no-worry flying experience. Features with over-current protection and an emergency stop to ensure a safe and reliable flight. The Controller is so cool and gives you a familiar pleasure like dominating the game.

【APP & After Sales Guarantee】The APP name is "RADXFLY", look for the wifi starting with "RADXFLY_X-28_XXXXXX" in your phone and connect directly. APP now supports Android 6.0+ and IOS 11.0+ or above systems. Please update your APP to the NEWEST version, so that the function icon can appear when using the Physical Controller Mode. If the drone/remote control has any issues during the flight, please contact us, we'll provide 24-hour technical support, quality guarantee, and money-back service.

1 Pack Light forAdventures 2 4K camera 3 Protection mechanism 
S118 Drone 
New Appearance Design 	Different from other drone shell designs, it adopts a carbon fiber shell design, which is different and makes the drone more resistant to falling. 	
Easy to Carry 	Equipped with a storage bag, and the overall weight of the drone is less than 160g 	
4K high-definition Dual Camera 	4K camera and 90° manually adjustable lens, increase the top-down angle shooting by switching the button, allowing you to enjoy real-time and vivid aerial photos and videos 	
Stable Altitude Hold 	After taking off, please allow 3-5 seconds for the light flow to stabilize. Once stable, the drone will automatically enter hover mode, maintain a stable altitude and remain stationary. This ensures you a stable and controlled flying experience. 	
Long Flight 	2 batteries are provided for use, which can be used for up to 30 minutes (if you use the one-button roll mode, the roll function will consume a lot of power, and it is recommended to use this function in an open space) 	
One-key Takeoff/Landing 	Easily start or land, just tap this function and it will automatically take off and keep flying or slowly fly down. 	
One Click to Scroll 	Tap one button, then the drone will perform a 360 flip making the flight more exciting. 	
Emergency Stop 	This mode is for emergency stop if there is a danger during the flight 	
Protection Mechanism 	To ensure the safety of the drone, we have equipped the drone with a mechanism that automatically activates when it flies beyond a certain remote control range. Once the drone reaches this limit, it will automatically hover in place, preventing it from flying further and preventing it from getting lost. 	
Reliable Flying Partner 	We recommend conducting your first flight in an open area. If you have any issues with the drone, remote control or app, you can contact the seller for solutions.

title: Mini Drone for Kids 8-12 & Adults, Drones & Cars 2 in 1 Toy with One Key Take Off-Landing, Altitude Hold, Headless Mode, 360° flip, Car Mode, 2 Batteries, Gift Kids Toys for Boys and Girls
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【Drone & Car 2 in-1 Design】: Exclusive advanced design, When you press the switch button, the drone indicator light will show green, which means flight mode; when you press it again, the drone indicator light will turn blue, which means the kids drone is in car mode. It can be used with the base to travel smoothly with other racing cars. Let your child have the feeling of running a racing car and flying a quadcopter at the same time.

【Car Mode】: We have equipped this rc helicopters with a base. It's so cool! Press the transform button to make the indicator light on the drone turn blue. At this time, you can control it to move forward and turn left and right (because the tail fan blades provide power, it cannot go back directly, please turn first). The smooth base with three-speed gears is suitable for most household carpets without worrying about resistance.

【Multi-functional and User-Friendly】: This dron has one-click takeoff landing, stable altitude hover, 360-degree roll, flexible headless mode, and fine-tuning functions. The intelligent chip allows you to control it to fly in various environments at will. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced person, you can quickly start playing. The default initial speed is first gear, speed up according to your needs. Come with 2 batteries and extra blades, cable fits your needs.

【Durable Quality and Longer Battery Life】: Using high-quality environmentally friendly materials makes the body more durable, and withstand countless bumps or drops. The four fan blades are wrapped for good protection, protecting your child from physical harm caused by spinning propellers. 2 batteries provide up to 20-30 minutes of battery life (20 minutes in flying mode, 26-30 minutes in car mode), longer using time than competitors.

【Perfect Present & 100% After-Sales Service】: As an exclusive two-in-one drone & car quadcopter, this toy is much more playable than similar products and will be the best car drones for kids. We provide 100% after-sales service. If the product you receive is defective or you encounter problems during use, please contact us in time and we will provide you with online services, including user guidance, reissue, and refund.

【About Operation】: After the remote control and the drone is turned on, you need to move the left joystick up and down to link the frequency. At this time, the drone's light turns blue, which represents car mode. You need to fold the drone's tail and use it with the car base. You can go forward, turn left, and turn right. Click the switch button on the remote control, and the drone's light will turn green, indicating flight mode. You need to keep the drone's tail flat for use.

How to switch between drone and car modes? 
Click the transform button, When the drone indicator light turns green, it represents flight mode; when the drone indicator light turns blue, it represents car mode. 
How to keep it stable and fly accurately? 
Please calibrate before each use, because the gyroscope data will be refreshed every time you use the headless mode, so you need to calibrate to reset the gyroscope before flying, then the flight will be more stable. 
Can children play with this? 
Yes, this is very easy to play and friendly to beginners. Even those who have never played before can easily control it with the function of one-click takeoff & headless mode. 
How long do the fully charged batteries last? 
This drone is equipped with 2 batteries, in flight mode, it can be used for 20 minutes around, and in car mode, it can be used for 26-30 minutes.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
MOCVOO Foldable Drone for Adults and Kids 
Equipped with a 120° Wide-angle 1080P HD Camera, including adjustable angle 
Equipped with Wi-Fi real-time transmission FPV system 
With one key take off /landing & altitude hold mode 
With 3D flips & Headless mode 
With gesture selfie functions, bring you more intelligent flying fun 
The RC drone can be carried around 
It is a mini drone for kids and adults, that’s a blast to fly and helps users learn about drones with Manual operation. It's easy for everyone to fly the drone. 
This drone is a perfect gift for lover, friends, family. Everyone should have a RC drone to experience the joy of control flight！ 
Flying Smarter And More Fun 
One Key Take Off / Landing 	Press the button to start or land the drone with one button, which is very convenient for beginners 	
Headless Mode 	Under this mode, you can play the drone without worring about what direction it is facing 	
Altitude Hold 	The drone will hover at the certain height when you release the throttle stick. Easy operation with extra fun 	
Three Adjustable Speeds 	E58 has different speed modes from low to high, suitable for beginners and intermediates and experts. You can have a different flight experience for fun 	
3D Flips 	Tap one button, E58 can perform a 360 flip and roll in any direction, makes the flight more exciting 	
Waypoints Fly 	Tap few flight routes on your phone, E58 will flight along the routes you set, to free your hands and discover unique view 	
Gesture Selfie 
With gesture control, you can pose to the camera to trigger phone taking and video recording. Free your hands free to take wonderful shot. 
More Flying Time 
Equipped with two 3.7v 600mAh batteries to supply more fly time！Easy to replace. 
Propeller Protection 
The propeller protective cover can reduce the damage caused by collision to the propeller blade, it is more durable. 
Service: If you have some problem with the drone, Please feel free to communicate with us, we will give you the satisfactory solution. 
Specifications: 
Photo/Video Resolution: 1080P (120° Wide-angle ) 
Flight Time: 2 x 10mins 
Charging time: 60 minutes 
Battery：2*3.7V 600mAh 
Transmission Distance: no more than 80m 
Warm Tips： 
● It is recommended that beginners do not fly in strong winds. Flying high, please take care not to be blown away by the wind. 
● It is recommended to use the third gear flying speed in a windy environment, otherwise the drone may lose control because it cannot withstand the wind. 
● The remote control distance should not exceed 80 meters, otherwise it may cause the drone to lose control. 
● The drone will flash a red light when the battery is low, please return as soon as possible to avoid fall. 
● If you need to take photos or videos, it is recommended that the fly drone should not be too far away from the subject to ensure better shooting results. 
● When the remote control battery is low, it will not be able to connect, please pay attention to keep the remote control battery full.

Product Description
360°Flips & Rolls 
One key 360° roll, continuous roll for perfect action and wonderful performance. 
One step start/take off 
One key take off/landing function adapts to all experience levels even for beginners. 
Headless mode 
No matter where the head of the drone points, the front of the remote control will be set as its front. In this mode, you can play the drone as you like without worrying about losing its direction. 
2 speed modes 
Simrex x500 Drone has 2 speed modes from low to high,suitable for beginners and intermediates and experts.You can have a different flight experience for fun. 
Dual-Assense Control 
SIMREX dual-assense control (mobile phone and remote control dual-assense control) can also be remotely controlled using a mobile phone or remote control, and can be controlled by the mobile phone when the remote control is disconnected. 
720P HD CAMERA 
Built-in 720P high definition FPV Wifi Camera, allows to take vivid aerial photos and videos, create a amazing impression of the sky. 
Gravity Control 
The Gravity mode enables the X500 to move in the direction of your mobile smartphone.

All With A Single Tap 
Palm Takeoff & Landing 

DJI Neo gracefully takes off and lands from your palm. Simply press the mode button on Neo, select your desired shooting mode, and Neo automatically does the rest to capture impressive footage, all without a remote controller! [1] 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
AI Subject Tracking 

Whether you're cycling, skateboarding, or hiking, Neo keeps pace as your personal photographer and ensures you are always in the spotlight. Equipped with AI algorithms, Neo can follow the subject within the frame, so you can set up captivating follow shots with ease. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Dronie 

The DJI Neo's camera tracks you as the drone ascends and moves backward, capturing stunning reveal shots of you and the scenery. The resulting dronie shot offers a seamless panoramic effect, adding grandeur to any location. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Circle 

The DJI Neo's camera orbits around you at a fixed altitude, capturing dynamic 360-degree videos. Choose the rotation direction for a comprehensive view from every angle, enhancing your presence in the environment.

Helix 

The drone elegantly spirals around you, creating captivating cinematic shots that keep you at the center. This feature elevates your creative toolset.

Boomerang 

The drone gracefully follows an oval path around you, capturing a dramatic shot that encircles you like a boomerang, adding flair to your aerial cinematography.

breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【NOTE】Make sure the drone battery is fully charged before flying. To ensure battery performance, use a 5V 2A charger and the USB cable included in the accessory (charger not included) to charge the drone battery.

【GPS Intelligent Flight】The GPS drone features high precision flight and safe return. The max flight distance is 1KM. When the drone is in low battery, signal loss or you press the auto return button, it will return to around the take-off point. The flight track recorded by APP can help you find the drone quickly, no need to worry about losing it. 【Note】Please turn on the GPS mode in outdoor.

【4K Camera】Drone with camera supports 4K photo and 1080P video, 90° electric adjustable camera and 120° wide angle can expand your field of view, WiFi transmission ensures longer lasting and smoother image.

【Powerful Motors】Weighs less than 249g, no need to register with FAA. Drone equipped with upgraded brushless motors bring effective and stable flight, can resist the wind of level 4. Foldable drone and easy carrying bag are convenient to carry the drone, especially suitable for traveling and camping!

【Long Flight Time】The 3 replaceable smart batteries will fly for about 15-18 minutes each time after fully charging, and the max flight time is 45-54 minutes in total. Battery operating time may vary slightly depending on the environment. Please use 5V/2A charger and original charging cable to charge the battery before flying.

【Multi-function Flight】Push the joystick to unlock different flight fun, such as auto-following, trajectory flight, hover flight, gesture photo, 3 speeds and more. Clear visualization screen allows you to quickly understand the flight mode, range, signal, battery status, especially suitable for long-distance flight.

【Warm Tips】Please fully charge the battery before each use. Before taking off, please choose an open place to fly this 4K drone to avoid signal blockage, and make sure the GPS signal is strong; please complete the calibration of the compass and gyroscope. If you have any questions, please message us for solutions, we will reply within 24 hours.

My drone's flight time is only a few minutes./ The battery is not working. 
Make sure the drone battery is fully charged before flying and use the original charging cables to charge. Flight time may be affected by wind, charge time, length of practice, temperature and other factors. The data given is for reference only. 
How do I connect my drone to my cell phone? 
Please allow the WiFi and drone app to access your phone and photo albums so that you can connect to the drone. 
How can the drone take off quickly? 
Please check out the tutorial video on the Amazon page.
